38912391.review:
The free Rusty Lake mobile games are basically room-escape games that establish atmosphere in the Rusty Lake world.  Rusty Lake Hotel is a creepy, short, can't-look-away room-escape game that is a must-play, for cheap.  This one, Rusty Lake: Roots, tells the story of the whole family in tiny little vignettes that are basically room-escape puzzles unfolded into one specific scene each.  As with Hotel, what happens to each family member is far more creepy than endearing, and it all comes together to keep you clicking along.

I was able to finish the game without hints in about 4-5 hours or so without getting stuck, but after the "final" big puzzle (no real spoilers ahead), the game uses two different mechanisms to extend the game time. One is satisfying (I zipped right through it) but the other is a clunky cheap shot.  However, I considered it worth the persistence it required only because I liked the final imagery tying this game to the previous one(s).

You can play this game without playing the others because the point of this world seems to be the feel rather than the plot.  And even though the game is at present still assembled like a mobile game, like Rusty Lake Hotel (it runs in a flash window and you may have trouble with your save file if you don't manage to allow Flash to use local storage), I consider it also a must-play if you like point-and-click puzzlers.

38800727.review:
《绣湖》是一款十分经典的解密游戏，同系列作品其他翻译可能是《逃离方块》，但《根源》应是系列中关卡最长剧情最多的一作了。
许多解密游戏往往在冗长的解密节奏中淡化了剧情，但这部作品将“树”承载了主角一家的家谱，每个角色在树枝上伸展枝条，演绎出各异的故事，叙事能力比起其他故事游戏毫不逊色。33小关各有各的剧情，每一关都小巧玲珑。在怪诞离奇的画面与解密中，稍微发挥想象便能意会出家族每个人传奇的故事。

《绣湖》系列传统便是解密过程中的微恐怖元素，本作同样如此。诡异的BGM搭配占卜、诅咒等超现实元素，在心理恐怖层面做得出彩。偶尔的Jump scare也[strike]可以刺激玩家神经，提醒不要在游玩过程中因为解密过于困倦，[/strike]是与主线剧情挂钩的元素，黑影、乌鸦等意向恰到好处，如何补全世界观可全权交给玩家。[spoiler]我才不承认是因为我太蠢了无法总结剧情呢。[/spoiler]

虽然是steam平台游戏，但UI系统更像手机移植，操作也是简单的点击拖动。不过正好，可以让玩家将更多的精力投入到解密与观赏剧情之中，这一点丝毫不扣分。
民间攻略有很多，提供一个百度首选的：[url=http://news.4399.com/xhgy/xinde/m/672543.html]http://news.4399.com/xhgy/xinde/m/672543.html[/url]
官方也提供了攻略，需要科学上网：[url=http://www.rustylake.com/walkthroughs/rusty-lake-roots/]http://www.rustylake.com/walkthroughs/rusty-lake-roots/[/url]
总结下来一句话：快来玩啊！快来玩《绣湖》系列啊！

总分：9.5/10

38790550.review:
I love this series of games!  Most of them are free, but I was more than happy to pay for this game.  

The world-building and atmosphere are the best parts.  You slowly unravel the mystery behind this strange family as you go through odd, creepy puzzles.  When you figure the puzzle out, it feels great.

However, there were two times in this game I got frustrated, gave up, and looked at the official walkthrough.  And when I saw the solution, it seemed counter-intuitive, and I don't think I would have solved them without the walkthrough.   But this is a small quibble I had with the game.  It could just be me.

Overall, I think this game is too interesting to pass up.  Its tone and way of story-telling will leave an impression on you.

38587863.review:
Отличный атмосферный квест. Однозначно в раздел "лучшее".

Информация в игре подается в основном изображением и мыслями героев; написано немного. Это заставляет задуматься не только о квестах(которые, кстати, оч крутые), но и о истории семьи Вандербум. Подается сюжет по-взрослому (а иногда творится полная жесть), несмотря на мультяшный стиль. Если искать аналогию с кино, то это триллер. Эффектов в игре почти нет, но иногда смотришь на происходящее открыв рот просто из-за сюжета.

Загадки сначала простые, но к середине становятся с каждым разом все хардкорнее. Скажу честно, все самому решить не получилось, в итоге 2 решения таки подсмотрел. Но тут все индивидуально. Для кого-то игра покажется "вообще изи".

В общем всем рекомендую к приобретению, тем более за такую скромную стоимость.

38553456.review: Ein Puzzlespiel mit eher düsterem/ grotestken Setting. Manchmal stand ich etwas auf dem Schlauch bei einigen Rätzeln, aber dafür gibt es vom Entwickler die Kompettlösung entsprechend im Level verlinkt. An sich waren die Rätzel aber sehr gut, keins davon erschien unlösbar und größtenteils kommt man gut durch. Bei mir funktionierte die Steuerung z.T. nicht 100%ig, aber das kann auch an meiner Maus liegen. Für fast 5h Spielzeit (evtl. weniger, wenn man die Rätzel schneller löst) ist der Preis durchaus angemessen. Wenn man vorher Rusty Lake Hotel gespielt hat, findet man einige Anspielungen darauf, es ist aber nicht notwendig umder Story zu folgen. Die Story an sich wird auch eher weniger erklärt und der Spieler kann sehr viel selber interpretieren. Das was man gezeigt bekommt ist aber in sich schlüssig (soweit das in dem eher surrealen Setting der beiden Rusty Lake-Spiele möglich ist). Für Rätzelfreunde mit hang zum Surrealen definitiv empfehlenswert

38370908.review:
这款游戏是锈湖系列解密游戏 开始有人推荐给我 但我并没有在意 后来过了很久看到了steam的推荐 决定还是买下来玩玩
锈湖根源讲的是这个家族发生的事情 通过每一个分叉 都让我看到这个家族所发生的一系列黑暗 仇恨 混乱的事
通关之后我发现这个系列有很多游戏 还有手游系列的游戏 叫做cube escape 于是我追了整个系列
说实话玩完之后 真的是十分佩服制作组的脑洞每一款都环环相扣 有着微妙的联系 其中细节做的也很不错 剧情十分紧凑

以下：严重剧透


两兄弟所炼出来的半成品永生药水 一个喝下去得到了永生 另一个猝死 三代人的恩恩怨怨 
转世后的威廉 为了让整个锈湖能正常运转 而被取出黑白记忆 导致黑化 屠杀所有人 被乌鸦阻止后回到过去改变命运
而同样的怀着各种目的来到旅馆的野猪 鹿人 鸽子 山鸡 兔子 他们每个人都掌握着锈湖的一些秘密
也都是猫头鹰为了让锈湖正常运作的牺牲品而已
你能够理解吗 [spoiler] ”all that you tough,you change"[/spoiler]

要把整个事件都串起来又要杀死我好多脑细胞
总之我很期待锈湖的下一部的新作 XD

38344522.review:
锈湖系列三部曲中的第二部，是一款很不错的点击类解密游戏，游戏以大树的生长画成了一个族谱，在每一次生长的时候，讲出了每一位家族的人的故事。最一开始的时候可能会让人不明白游戏讲的是什么故事，随着树的一点点长大一切内容便会水落石出。
优点：锈湖公司都一直喜欢做一些内容有些压抑的游戏，解密难度不是很高，可以尽情释放自己的想象力，没准你想的最荒唐的做法就是解题的最关键的那一步，只要耐下心来思考，寻找出游戏画面中的每一个细节，就总是能找出来答案。背景音乐有些压抑，不过很适合这款游戏。
缺点：流程稍微有一些短。
（ps.记得通关了以后玩儿番外！）
好评！10.0/10.0

37750569.review:
如果不是玩了旅馆在先，可能还不会感到那么意外（惊喜）。因为单就时长和剧情来看，如果说《锈湖旅馆》是一部预告片，那么《锈湖根源》就是一部40集的长篇电视剧（滑稽围笑）

《旅馆》本质上应该算是《无人生还》格局的故事，解谜的最终目的就是为了一个挨一个地杀死目标，没有复杂的主线剧情，因此机关的设置显得精巧、复杂，但又没什么理由。比方说，暗（明）杀对象需要热水来泡澡，玩家的目标就是帮他解决热水问题的同时杀掉他，然后这个关卡就是玩家揭开各种谜题给他搞热水，顺便搞到凶器，但中间可能经历了五子棋、贪吃蛇还是消消乐等等谜面，反正就是和搞热水、搞凶器没有直接关系。老实说，市面上大多数的解谜游戏都是这个毛病。指名道姓，说的就是你，G5。

而《根源》毕竟是后出的，就是不一样。它的谜面是有语境的，甚至有的时候就是伏笔。比方说贯穿全文的、暗示各个角色身份和命运的塔罗牌。涉及塔罗牌的关卡就有好几个，而且从整体故事看来，有理有据，前后呼应，尤其是第十六关 the lying game，关卡设计简直精彩好嘛！而且（非常重要的是）谜面一有逻辑就不是很难了，不靠攻略也能过，手残癌喜大普奔。

虽然锈湖系列目前就出了这两部，但关于锈湖的完整故事加上cube escape系列总共好像十多部吧，总之是个大坑，慎入（深似海啊深似海）。

非常非常友情提示：第三十一关 the stars 包含成就 the date（the day he was born），要全成就的旁友注意一下，一旦错过就要整个游戏重新来过（微笑）。

[b] 10 / 10 [/b]

37236559.review:
不管如何我都非常喜欢这个独立游戏制作组：Rusty Lake，我喜欢他们这种叙事风格和解密理念。
他们总是以看似没有联系的事物在逐渐串联中慢慢显露端倪，最后结局让人深思希望继续追下去。我私以为这款游戏很适合揭秘探索，虽然是流程和剧情固定，但是家族成员之间以生命树表现的形式来作为相互关联的枝杈，这种感觉不会让你有断代的感觉。有点像小说《百年孤独》里那种家族式慢慢前进的感觉，但又有最后家族后代复活先祖的翻转。解密到最后揭秘，是一种非常欢愉的体验，让人玩后久久不能平静。所以我自设了一个揭秘者的欢愉奖来奖励我最爱的这个系列其中之一——《Rusty Lake：Roots》
很可惜的是Steam上只有这两款付费合作的游戏。如果玩后仍然非常喜欢的同好们可以去制作组官网中看看，还有更多惊喜等着呢。

36596551.review:
모두 같은 세계관을 공유하고 있는 러스티 레이크 시리즈의 roots입니다.

불로불사의 비밀을 찾으려는 Vanderboom 가문의 이야기로,
같은 시리즈인 러스티 레이크 Hotel보다 더욱 괴기스럽고 심오하고 잔혹(+혐오) 합니다.

러스티 레이크 호텔이 누구나가 즐겁게 할 수 있는 가벼운 호텔 조식 요리(...) 게임이었다면, 
루츠에서는 William Vanderboom의 자손들의 일생과 가계도, 비극, 숨겨진 비밀들을 파헤쳐 볼 수 있습니다.

포인트 앤 클릭 방식의 플래시 게임이지만, 분량 많고 사운드도 준수하며 인물간의 관계에 많은 공을 들인 것이 보입니다.

게임 자체도 퍼즐이 어렵지 않은 편이라 재밌고 몰입력이 있으며
도전과제 올클리어도 공략을 조금만 참고하면 가능하기 때문에 꼭 구매하셔서 플레이 해보시는 것을 추천드립니다!

36321851.review:
İhtiraslı bir yaşam döngüsü...

Amcamızın vefatı üzerine mirası almak için yola çıkıyoruz. Harika bir muhitte, bir köşk ve mal varlığına sahip oluyoruz. Derken evlenip üç çocuk sahibi oluyoruz. Fakat çocuklarımız birbiri ile pek iyi anlaşamıyor ve birbirlerinin arkalarından çeşitli oyunlar oynuyorlar. Hikayede de kademe kademe bu aşamaları ve çocuklarımızın birbiri ile etkileşimlerini oynuyoruz. 

Oyun tüm aşamaların içerisinde ciddi anlamda bulmacalar bulundurmakta. Bazıları için uzun uzun kafa patlatmak gerekebiliyor. Bazı yorumlarda soy ağacını işlediği söyleniyor ama anne baba ve üç çocuktan oluşan soy ağacı olmaz burada sadece bir aile döngüsü işlenmektedir. Konuların içerisinde astronomiden, fala, savaştan, botaniğe, peysajdan, fiziğe bir çok hikaye ve hikaye ile paralel bulmacalar ile karşılaşıyoruz. Kendine has dinlendirici müzikleri mevcut. Oynarken sıkılmıyorsunuz. 

Özellikle yalan oyunu bölümü oldukça hoşuma gitti. İçerisinde ihanetten, romantizme, yoksulluktan, trajediye her duygudan nüanslar bulunduran bu deneyimi herkese tavsiye ederim.

10/6,5

36271156.review:
Dieses Spiel ist ein Kunstwerk. Wie Kunst nunmal ist, versteht man oftmals nicht genau, was gerade passiert oder warum es passiert, doch man hat versinkt in dieses Spiel, es zieht einen in seinen Bann. Ich weiß nicht genau, ob es die abstrusen Charaktere sind oder das absolut perfekte Point 'n Click-Gameplay, möglicherweise auch einfach die Idee hinter dem Spiel, doch es lässt mich einfach nicht in Ruhe. Ich liebe fast alle Spiele, die Rusty Lake entwickelt haben, aber dieses stach besonders hinaus. Es sind einige recht knifflige Passagen enthalten, die einem wieder ins Gedächnis rufen, dass man sich hier in einem Spiel befindet und nicht nur in einem wunderschönen Stück Kunst. Wenn mich jemals jemand fragen sollte, wie Videospiele Kunst sein können, werde ich ihn dieses Spiel spielen lassen und wenn die Person auch nur ansatzweise so tickt wie ich, würd sie diese Erfahrung in vollen Zügen genießen.
Lange Rede, kurzer Sinn: Dieses Spiel ist absolut empfehlenswert. Falls ihr für ein paar Stunden Spielspaß nicht 2,99€ ausgeben wollt, setzt es einfach auf eure Wishlist und kauft es euch im nächsten Sale, es rennt euch nicht weg. Aber ich verspreche euch, es wird jeden einzelnen Cent wert sein.
Und schaut mal auf der Seite der Entwickler vorbei, dort bieten sie einige grandiose Flashgames an, kostenlos natürlich. Sie sind eigentlich allesamt eure Zeit wert.

36172607.review:
[h1]GENRE:[/h1]

Puzzle, Point & Click, Psycho-Horror

[h1]VERGLEICHBAR MIT:[/h1]

The Room, Eventide

[h1]SCHWIERIGKEITSGRAD:[/h1]

Sehr ausgewogen

[h1]DARUM GEHT'S:[/h1]

Das Spiel zeichnet szenisch über mehrere Generationen die wichtigsten Ereignisse und Schlüsselerlebnisse der  Lebensgeschichte der Vanderbooms nach. Die Aufgabe des Spielers besteht dabei in jeder Szene eine Vielzahl unterschiedlichster Rätsel zu lösen, die vor allem abstraktes Denken und Kombinationsvermögen vom Spieler fordern.

[h1]DAS IST GUT:[/h1]

[b]+[/b] Sehr abwechslungsreiche und gut durchdachte Rätsel
[b]+[/b] Sehr gut ausbalancierter Schwierigkeitsgrad 
[b]+[/b] Spricht eine große Bandbreite von Emotionen an
[b]+[/b] Stimmungsvoll, humorvoll, tragikomisch
[b]+[/b] Interessante und ziemlich eigenwillig inszenierte Story
[b]+[/b] Bonusrätsel
[b]+[/b] Ohne Bugs keine Sackgassen

[h1]DAS IST SCHLECHT:[/h1]

[b]-[/b] Einige Rätsel/Szenen können fehlerhaft sein (Neustart hilft manchmal)
[b]-[/b] Manchmal unpräzise Handhabung
[b]-[/b] Etwas unübersichtlicher Handlungsverlauf
[b]-[/b] Handlung hätte durchaus noch ausführlicher sein dürfen

[h1]PREIS-LEISTUNGS-VERHÄLTNIS: Hervorragend[/h1]

[h1]FAZIT:[/h1]

Rusty Lake: Roots ist sowas wie das technische Antidot zu The Room. Und es ist gerade deshalb jeden einzelnen Cent wert. Mit den (absichtlich!) dilettantisch anmutenden Animationen und dem simplen Zeichstil schaffen es die Entwickler auf ihre ganz eigene skurrile Weise eine gruselige Geschichte zu erzählen, die den Spieler in ein einmaliges Wechselbad der Gefühle schmeißt; und ihn daraus auch nicht so bald entlässt. Dafür sorgen allein schon die abwechslungsreichen und sehr durchdachten Rätsel, die von einfachen Fingerübungen bis zu echten Kopfnüssen reichen und jederzeit mit etwas Hirnschmalz lösbar sind. Sofern keine Bugs auftreten! Das ist bei mir zwei Mal passiert. Einmal half ein Neustart des Spiels.  Im anderen Fall war unterhalb einer Neuinstallation (mit Verlust sämtlicher Spielstände) nichts zu machen. Das ist aber soweit das einzige wirklich ärgerliche Manko des Spiels. Der Rest ist vor allem in Anbetracht des niedrigen Preises schlichtweg hervorragend!

35821557.review:
So this review might be a little weird. To start off, I'm not very good at puzzles. I never have been and I probably never will be. Thankfully, this game has just the right amount of balance with difficulty to make looking a guide a seldom occurence (but I did indeed need one on occasion). 

The story, from what I have seen, is awesome. I really enjoy the art and some scenes (like with the well) actually disturbed me. This does not happen very often and I applaud the developer for this. 

Now here is what I didn't like and it has nothing to do with the story or the puzzles or anything like that. I have played about six hours of this game. Six hours of continuous puzzles and wracking my brain for sequences. Then one day the game suddenly got achievements on steam! Yay! Oh wait, not yay. The update with those achievements wiped my progress and I had to start at the beginning. I have barely touched the game since then. 

Honestly though, it's a really good game. That's why I was so sad when my progress got deleted through no fault of my own. But, I still do reccomend this game if you like a good story and puzzles.

卧槽这不就是《百年孤独》的游戏版嘛！
James和Mary就是何塞·阿尔卡蒂奥·布恩迪亚和乌尔苏拉，第一代何塞·阿尔卡蒂奥就是沉迷炼金术最后才死的。

第三代还没玩到，稍后补全。
====================================
哇怎么突然多了这么多赞，我都忘记这条评论了。
Leonard应该是奥雷里亚诺·何塞吧，因为军旅经历嘛。
Frank是梅梅的私生子奥雷里亚诺·布恩迪亚，都算是在家族外部长大吧，Rose当然是和他骨科的阿玛兰妲·乌尔苏拉，也是她生下家族的最后一个人。
但这样Emma对应的人物就是梅梅了，其实我觉得她也更像梅梅一点， 因为她是花粉怀孕，意味着孩子的父亲身份不明或者为避丑闻不能提起，这里跟梅梅很像。

35629887.review:
I finished the main game and it was....well weird.  
The game was engaging and the puzzles were really fun.  As a point and click I loved it because it stuck to small screens so I wasn't waiting for my character to slowly backtrack screen after screen after screen finding things and clicking at random.  I was never at a loss for what to do, I always had a goal, the puzzles were usually straight forward, and the game consistently subverted my expectations keeping game play fresh and exciting.  
Be warned however, this game might be disturbing for some people, it's freaky in the very least.  It's interesting, but man I did not see some of those actions coming.  
The story was well told, albeit unique.  
It's hard not to recommend this game though, I was entertained and it ran and led me along smoothly.  It's worth a play if you like creepy tales and puzzles.

提示：所有成就都可以在一周目直接完成。

Rusty Lake Cocktall成就： 是需要果汁+伏特加
伏特加合成：空气+石头=沙子+火=玻璃+水=一瓶水
                     空气+石头=沙子+植物=谷类（云+土=植物）
                     一瓶水+谷类=伏特加
果汁合成：   土+火=岩浆+空气=石头+火=金属=火=电，空气+石头=沙子+火=玻璃
                    电+玻璃=灯泡+植物=水果（云+土=植物）
                    金属+石头=刀刃+电=搅拌机（金属和石头合成在上面伏特加合成里面有）
                    水果+搅拌机=果汁
The Date成就： [spoiler] 在星星那关点击鹦鹉的尾巴几次鹦鹉就会飞走然后玻璃上会显示一串生日，点击生日就可以完成成就了。	（这个生日的主人在前几作都有出现，再次安利小伙伴们玩一下前几作）[/spoiler]这个成就因为不是大头像所以如果在一周目玩的时候没有注意的话可能就要二周目了。

Laura成就：在rose的通灵板上拼出cube escape。（玩过其他几部的小伙伴可以在输入以后再次点击rose，她会说一句话。另外这个妹子也在其他几部里面出现！）
个人感想：
自己觉得Albert挺可怜的，因为小时候被哥哥还有姐姐欺负对心理造成了伤害，所以长达后心理也有点不健全[spoiler] 做出了把Frank推下井里还有喜欢上自己嫂子的事情	[/spoiler]
说了这么多，你们快去玩其它几作啊！(´・ω・｀)都不要钱的！这么良心的游戏！还不快去玩2333

35449449.review:
I wasn’t expecting a whole lot after Rusty Lake Hotel. As interesting as the premise and setting were, the strange little puzzle box rooms of irritating brain-teasers didn’t give me much hope. That made it all the more surprising when Rusty Lake: Roots appeared to take all the lessons I had hoped they would from the prior game. It’s not a perfect genesis of the series, but the improvement is so dramatic I think it makes Rusty Lake Hotel a stronger recommendation by association.

The year is 1860 and James Vanderboom has just inherited a house from his late uncle. Arriving in the spring, he finds a seed and a note with instructions to plant and tend to it as he looks after the estate. From this humble beginning blooms the tale of the cursed Vanderboom family, tracing the lives of three generations of unfortunate souls. As their lives take their tragic turns, the story weaves everything back to that original seed and their unifying curse, and ultimately one of the dark secrets of Rusty Lake.

Much like the previous game, Roots is heavily steeped in the macabre. None of the people whom you guide through these stories will meet kind ends, and many will suffer significant agonies before their lives are allowed to end. It’s not as gory or gormless as its precursor though, and does a much better job of living up to the macabre label. Most of the horror here comes from witnessing the inevitable, from seeing a scene build to an obvious tragedy and being powerless to stop it. Some of the best plotlines here involve lost children or love triangles that give the sinister events a more grounded base.

The drama unfolds in short vignettes, arranged chronologically along the lifelines of the players in question. These vignettes are single scrollable scenes which contain a handful of puzzles to solve in the course of reaching a generally obvious result. It might be as charming as getting a gentleman to propose to a lady, as painful as sending a young man off to war, or as nefarious as dropping a young boy down a well. Scenes should take about 10-15 minutes to complete, during which you’ll uncover more clues to the overarching mystery and perhaps a few hints as to the nature of Rusty Lake itself.

The big improvement here for me is the quality of the puzzles, which are all far more sensical and thematically consistent than those in Hotel. Having single scenes focused around a central puzzle or puzzles helps limit potential flailing and allows each puzzle to do more in service to the story. I only found myself stumped in a few places, and this time I didn’t feel like it was because the puzzles were badly designed. Everything had a purpose and a logic to it, and that gave the game a more cohesive feel overall.

The only aspect I found weaker this time was the ending, unfortunately enough. By the third generation of characters it should be clear what the ultimate goal of the game is, and when you reach the end it just kinda happens and then fades to black. There’s no real revelation aside from the immediate result of your actions, and it falls a lot flatter than the insane reveals at the end of Hotel. I did play through the New Game+ style continuation to see the secret ending and while I liked that one more, it still didn’t do much to satisfy my curiosities.

While there are obviously links between Rusty Lake Hotel and Roots, they’re minor enough that you wouldn’t miss much by skipping Hotel. It’s unfortunate the story doesn’t take more advantage of the otherworldly weirdness of its predecessor but Roots is a strong enough game to stand on its own and command your attention for a few hours. The disturbing scenes and thematic puzzles do an excellent job of gripping the player as they uncover the secrets of this sad family, and only fail to completely pay off at the very end. As long as you’re not expecting something mind-blowing in the conclusion, though, this one definitely succeeds where Rusty Lake Hotel stumbled.



Did you enjoy this review? I certainly hope so, and I certainly hope you'll check out more of them at https://goldplatedgames.com/ or on my [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/audish]curation page[/url]!

34570346.review:
脑洞太棒！
第一次玩锈湖这种2d的解谜小游戏，看这名字中都仿佛弥漫着一股腐朽的气息和阴谋的味道，贼适合在暑假中的某一个闷热的午夜里独自一个人慢慢体验，避暑纳凉很清爽（滑稽。
童话手绘风的画风非常讨喜，每个人物的关键个性都可以从某些明显的特征上体现出来。可能是我这类游戏玩的少，能用传达信息很有限、手段只能靠解密的方式来讲一个完整的故事，（就像那些年代的黑白默片那样，）是很迷人、令我沉醉的事情（完了我老了）。
游戏流程不看攻略自己琢磨是一件挺有意思的事，整体上来说不难，只不过有些地方会让我卡住很久然后恍然大悟原来是这个细节没有做好，宏观上，解谜的逻辑没有太大的问题，只是小细节的处理（比如我明明把这里对齐了为什么没判定上呢？哦，原来还要再精确一毫米）有点想掀桌。
最有趣的果然还是某些谜题的脑洞，太奇葩233，有很多小惊喜，还不至于让我觉得太牵强太扯淡。玩到某些地方，就像关卡设计师在开着完全不好笑黑色的玩笑，而他这种一本正经开玩笑的态度才是最有趣的地方。
总而言之是一款好游戏，能给我一些惊喜和思考的游戏都是好游戏。
（btw，我觉得这个剧情可以去拍一个微型美剧了都）

Szkoda że nie ma opcji jak w Rusty Lake Hotel oglądania lokacji w widoku takim pseudo "3d".Za to lokacji jest dużo dużo więcej no i można przesuwać pole widzenia gdzieś na dwa może trzy ekrany. Podobnie jak cała seria Rusty Lake bogata jest w niecodzienne rozwiązania zagadek czasami niezbyt smaczne np . danie do zjedzenia łożyska matki po porodzie do zjedzenia psu lub napojenie spragnionego szklanką z sikami psa. W sumie to wymieniłem już te najbardziej niesmaczne rzeczy. No jest jeszcze jeden z członków rodziny psychopatyczny Albert ale jego historia z kolei była najciekawsza chyba! This is a very dark and unique game. It offers you a view into a couple generations of a single family and with each level you complete, you see how intricately tied together all the characters are (they definitely got some issues).

I definitely enjoyed this game :)

33952579.review:
这个游戏必须怒赞啊！还是在夏日特惠花10块钱买的合集，当时只是觉得名字很不错，看了下标签，连简介都没看，就买了。后来抱着轻松一下的心情打开了Roots，我简直吓坏了。并不是说谜题多么有趣新奇，谜题本身并不难，而是这解题思路让我心中充满了狂想，你会惊呼“这TM（TM必须要有）还有这种操作啊！！！”。尤其是跟上作者思路之后，就有一种凝望深渊之感，开始还会抵抗一下这腹黑故事（但双手很诚实），后来就很自觉地一路黑到底甚至还嫌不够黑。
另外一点就是，一开始还当是一个黑色幽默小游戏来玩，让我想到了《亚当斯一家》，到后面发现根本就不是，这是一个炼金邪教家族百年悲惨，[spoiler] 为的是啥？——让我复活！ [/spoiler] 里面夹杂着许多血腥味，报复与欺骗，还有尿味。。。而且谜题跟故事的结合也很好，甚至有几个特别出彩。故事还用了多线叙事的方式，在个别的地方，例如怎么这个女人在这就上吊了，怎么井底这个人需要根棍子，他是谁？这种稍微留意一下的地方竟然在别的线里得到了解释，再结合略略出现的几张报纸上的标题来看，我觉得妙不可言啊！当时我觉得很多游戏里的小纸条（明明就是大纸条）什么的，都弱爆了啊！
本来point and click的解谜游戏玩得并不多，发现了锈湖系列真的有种大乡里出城之感。。。。。。

当然也不是毫无缺点，有些地方的解谜还是很牵强的，主线的最后一题我就很不喜欢。

最后，打算玩的盆友最好把游戏全成就，可以直接攻略，有隐藏剧情的。

33927993.review:
Hepimiz zaman zaman nereden geldiğimizi ve soylarımızın nerelere kadar dayandığını merak etmişizdir. Hatta bazılarımız sadece düşünmekle kalmaz işi sonuna kadar götürerek öğrenir ve bir soyağacı tablosu oluşturur. Bu benim de bir süredir yapmayı planladığım bir şey ama harekete geçecek o adımı atmak bir türlü nasip olmadı. İşte Rusty Lake: Roots da bizlere böyle bir oyun sunuyor. Oyun; James Vanderboom adında kendi halinde, bana dokunmayan yılan bin yaşasın modunda bulunan sıradan bir adamın başına talih kuşu konmasını anlatmasıyla başlıyor. Zengin amcamız gizemli bir şekilde ölmüştür ve kimse ne olduğunu bilmemektedir. Tek varis de biz olunca bunu duyar duymaz, apar topar fakir modundan çıkmış ve bir anda saygı duyulan, bir şey bilmese dahi herkes tarafından dinlenen bir beyefendi haline gelmişizdir. Amacımız; soyun devamını sağlayarak torun torba sahibi olmak ve amcamızın gizemli ölümünün arkasındaki sır perdesini aralamaktır.  

Rusty Lake: Roots bol bol bulmacaları bulunan tıklamalı bir macera oyunu. Bir ekstra bölümüyle beraber totalde toplam 34 bölümden oluşuyor. Bölümleri geçmek için verilen bulmacaları çözmek gerekiyor ve bu bulmacaların zorlukları da oyun ilerledikçe daha zor bir hal alıyor. Sevimli görsellere ve grafiklere sahip bu oyun boyunca arkaplanda çalan müzikler olsun, sesler olsun hiç sırıtmıyor. Başarımların tümünü kazanarak tam manasıyla nokta koymak istediğinizde ortalama 6 saat gibi bir oyun süresine sahip. Bana göre tek eksik yanı kısa olması, biraz daha uzun sürse hiç fena olmazdı. Her bir dakikasından keyif aldığınız bir oyun ile karşılaştığınızda hiç bitmesin istiyorsunuz. Ama maalesef, hayat işte... Her güzel şey gibi bu da bitiyor. Oyunun en güzel noktasının verilen Türkçe dil desteği olduğunu söylemeden geçemeyeceğim. Yapımcılara ve emeği geçen arkadaşlara özellikle bunun için teşekkürlerimi sunmak istiyorum. Bu desteği vermemiş olsaydınız şu anda böyle bir oyun ile hiç tanışmamış olacaktım. Darısı Rusty Lake Hotel'in başına diyelim. Yapımcılar, beni duyuyor musunuz?  

Sözü fazla uzatmayacağım. Bir soyağacı oluşturmak, zaman denen kavramın yitip gittiğini görmek ve yeni hayatlara tanıklık etmek; onların sevinçlerini paylaşmak ve acılarına ortak olmak oldukça güzel bir deneyimdi. Bu koca soyağacı yeşerirken kendinize uygun bir koltuk kapmak isteyebilirsiniz. Zira Vanderboom Ailesi'nin misafirperverliği karşısında oldukça hoşnut kalacaksınız. Bu adamlar nasıl konuk ağırlanır gerçekten de iyi biliyor. [9/10]

33926216.review:
CUBE ESCAPE系列是我非常喜欢的解谜系列之一，虽然都是小游戏，但是每一部的质量都还是不错的。
RUSTY LAKE有两作，算是从另一个角度来叙述游戏背景吧。内容上比CUBE丰富，尤其是该作——ROOTS。
喜欢这种类型的朋友可以补一补CUBE系列（免费的！还犹豫什么！）另一作HOTEL。
ROOTS刚出的时候就在steam上买了…结果360显示为病毒（？？？）把游戏删了…后来又入了手机版，全部通关。
最近为了成就，又玩了一遍，全成就达成。嘻嘻。
[spoiler]本作有两个成就略有难度——The Date和Laura。个人觉得算是两个小彩蛋吧。1.关卡：Frank星星。具体步骤：出现鹦鹉后，先取下鹦鹉脖子上的信，再点击其尾巴。鹦鹉消失，窗户关闭，在玻璃上出现日期，成就达成。2.关卡：Rose。具体步骤：在通灵板上输入CUBEESCAPE即可达成成就。[/spoiler]
以下个人小感受：
Frank是个苦命的娃…小舅舅性格阴郁…由于不愉快的童年以及对他妈妈和大舅舅的怨恨，将一部分气撒在了他的身上…设计使他坠井…母亲不知他在哪里[strike]（您就不能往井里看一眼吗）[/strike]…伤心自杀…Frank长期生活在井里…从外界求得的一杯“水”竟然还是[spoiler]狗料[/spoiler]…
嘻——————————————————————嘻———————————————————————嘻 
总之这是一款很不错的小品级解谜游戏。
友情提示：[spoiler]中长篇测评请记得保存…一旦崩溃…嘻嘻。[/spoiler]

33524253.review:
但凡解谜游戏中的佳作,或以谜题取胜,或以情节取胜;前者侧重于精巧复杂的谜题设计,不遗余力地全方位完善、打磨解谜要素,甚至使玩家就算解不出来也可看着赏心悦目,这一类别里The Room实至名归;后者是在谜题这个主体之外又附丽上缜密而不失必要的故事,大都散乱地呈现,旨在令玩家得以在拼凑中品味到抽丝剥茧的乐趣,同时又能弥补主体的差强人意,其中The Last Door可为表率。至于两者间极其罕见却并非乌有的结合,说它存在于Rusty Lake甚至更久远的Cube Escape系列中是不能更恰如其分了。

Cube Escape顾名思义是密室逃脱类游戏。密室逃脱概括来说就是一系列繁复冗长、到处找东西输密码的过程,用这一游戏形式作为载体来叙说支离破碎的故事,还能因此获得一个极富盛名的归宿的,恐怕只此一家。2013年的Samsara Room一作作为全系列的雏形理应只是个信手粗制滥造的小品,但在其中我们已能窥见日后为人所熟知的要素和基本情结,诸如乌鸦人、方块、落地座钟以及轮回,这足以印证这套体系或至少其概念在早先既已成形,两年后集聚涌现的八部系列作品便断然是长期深思熟虑得来的精华。同所有成功的小众游戏系列一样,Cube Escape的名望催生出了后来的两部更为广受赞誉的商业作品。第一部Hotel仍采用密室逃脱的外观与始终如一的章节式风格,也着实融合了前作几乎所有的优点,在巧妙程度上来说可称其为系列代表作;但其无非是一款颇具匠心的别致精品,所交代的事实寥寥无几,因而从整体上看全无意义,因为整个系列的精髓即在于将隐蔽的全貌打碎为彼此独立的、必须融会贯通才能瞥见其完整原貌的片断。第二部,即本作,则无疑具有这种意义;它填补了一片硕大的空白,玩家也能隐约感到其与Hotel间的联系。

本作用碎片化的间断性叙事——与所有系列作品没有本质区别,只不过容量更大——讲述了不祥的范德博姆家族史,虽谈不上荡气回肠,却也诡异凄然。如果任何事物都要通过与鼎鼎大名的同类比拟方能展现出其价值的话,那Roots就几乎是一部浓缩版的、可互动的《百年孤独》,只是更加参差错落而不可思议,当然这种说法得建立在与先前诸作连贯地形成体系的前提下。游戏中可以一睹这个畸形的却又不能不引人怜悯的家族由滋生到完成它的最终使命的全过程,虽然一些来龙去脉被无可避免地掩盖了起来;可以想见,这种剧情中必然不会蕴含浩瀚如洛式的“广大无边的恐怖”,但在如家族这样小的范围内,本作却竭尽所能地彰显出了最为巨大的恐怖。相应地,游戏提供了一个叙说家族史的先例,稍微不同于魔幻现实主义的迷离风格,而是直率地揭开光鲜下血淋淋的丑恶与惊异,却依然存有意识流的意味;这类手法的好处,恐怕What Remains of Edith Finch也从中汲取不少。界面上与以往的密室逃脱设计有极大的不同,因为如前所述,这一游戏类型用来叙述什么样的故事都不是非常恰当的,同时从Hotel开始,这一系列就已能不拘泥于密室逃脱了。发生在不同时间断面的故事本身,虽然总是部分以晦涩的方式讲述,并兼有隐喻和人物难以理解的行为穿插其中,但仍未不清晰到让人有云里雾里之感。应当看到,在商业化的前作取得人尽皆知的成绩后,落在本作肩上的任务和期望是如何被出色地完成了的。一贯的氛围自不必说,情节则如上所述,谜题精巧而引人入胜,如此种种全被涵括于巨大的诡谲与阴险的意蕴之中,无怪乎Cube Escape竟能坐拥这样一批数量与其题材不相匹的玩家群体。

大多数解谜游戏——尤其是开头提到的后一种——都会不由自主地与恐怖题材挂钩,这或是因为神秘总是与可怕连在一起,或是因为肯在这些领域深入以致制出作品的人大都怀揣着不平凡的想法、渴求离奇的刺激。但其中绝大部分都只是单纯地、近乎粗野生硬地将只能带来短期心理作用的或血腥、或畸形、或神密甚或病态的场景安插在游戏进程中,再就是伴以啁哳凌乱的刺耳音效,最高级者也无非是为这令人麻木的场景、这引人作呕的音效配上一小段尚算生动的文字描述;就连相当一部分佼佼者也未能免俗。Rusty Lake也绝不能说是完全脱离了这些繁复的理念,某些方面还有过之而无不及。这都是由恐怖解谜游戏自身性质所造就的瑕疵,犹如古董上的罅隙,无论易手于何人,修复自何匠,它总是客观地静卧在各种成色之下。但Rusty Lake: Roots最为独特、最值得一提的地方在于它虽部分受制于这些因素,却仍能以魅力近乎彻底地抵消其带来的负面影响(比如让人觉得枯燥无味,不想再玩下去),独立于游戏类型的桎梏之外,得心应手地完成自身在各种定位间的转换。一言以蔽之,Rusty Lake: Roots一整款游戏本身连同它那令人着迷的特质都应为独立游戏制作者所摹仿,因为尽管它的受众群体和成本都同样有限,它却仍能特立独行地超然飘忽于一切游戏界约定俗成的框架之外。从这个意义上来说,它不仅已完满地实现了系列自赋意义的目的,还有意无意地制出了一个堪称经典的范例。

33513218.review:
I paid a little under $5 for the bundle which included both Rusty Lake games. I regret buying and playing both of them. 

This game in particular has the superior story, is longer, and... more puzzles. I don't say better or worse puzzles because while it does have some more challenging ones (in a good way) than Hotel did, it also has some that are harder (in a bad way) than Hotel. 

There are intriguing puzzles that caused me to really think and learn throughout the game, but there were also janky kinds of jigsaw-puzzle areas that wouldn't function properly when you tried to "snap" the pieces in place, making it all the more furstrating trying to even solve them. There were also of course, the same kinds of puzzles that were in Hotel where you figure out the solutions either by accident, clicking things randomly and using your items on every possible item until something happens. It's a very mixed bag of super creative puzzles and god-forsakenly awful puzzles that make you want to look up guides sooner than ask for hints.

What about the story? I purchased the bundle initially because I really thought the story was interesting. And throughout, it really is. It's gorey, creepy, with minimal jump-scares, and throughout the whole thing you can feel how it's only going to get worse for the characters. But by the end...? It's kind of a let down. Some have said "It's referencing the Cube Escape games!" but I personally believe any and all spin-off stories should still be able to hold their own in their self-contained worlds. This game sort of did, but it doesn't explain motivations of most of the characters, and leaves you with a very redundant, poorly executed conclusion of: (SPOILERS BELOW)

It's all some kind of reincarnation time loop! Not very interesting, not very appealing, and because the game doesn't explain how time is repeating this way, or why, it's just kind of. Blah. We don't even get to really know the character that is the cause of this time loop, either. Or how the supposed master-mind is pulling it off/why. It's not satisfying at all.

I believe anything with effort put into it is worth some amount of money, but I do wish I had not bought these games. You can get the exact same experience just watching someone play it live, and so unless you can get it for 1 dollar, I'd say take a pass. Even if you love puzzles, the horrible excuses for puzzles, and broken controls for a good amount of them, aren't worth the head-ache. And the longer the game goes on, the more non-sensical the "puzzles" get.

33466601.review:
I picked up the Rusty Lake games wanting to finally start moving towards addressing my fear of playing horror themed games and for those of you who aren't a fan of horror but would like to change that, this is a good start. The game is at times disturbing and there were a few occasions I had to 'nope' out but it was well worth it.

Rusty Lake Roots is certainly a step up from the original Rusty Lake Hotel (both of which are worth a playthrough). You solve puzzles to make your way through a family tree and come across a disturbing story. The puzzles are at times a decent challenge and there is even a great completion reward (similar to a true story ending) for those of you like to 100% complete games like myself. I quite like the asthetics of the game and can see a lot of love and effort went into the game.

33454558.review:
Une très bonne surprise. Rusty Lake Roots propose de constituer l'arbre généalogique d'une famille un peu spéciale en résolvant une suite d'énigmes qui nous font découvrir la vie et la mort des uns et des autres. Bien que partageant les personnages et leur histoire, chaque scène est indépendante des autres et offre sont lot d'objets et de puzzles.

Il y a suffisament de scènes pour que le jeu ait une durée de vie raisonnable. J'ai trouvé l'ensemble très progressif. On part sur du simpliste et on finit sur de l'ardu; même avec la solution je cherche encore à comprendre 2 ou 3 énigmes des derniers tableaux.

Faut se méfier de la simplicité initiale et des graphismes un peu rustiques, ça ne s'adresse pas aux tout-petits, on est dans un univers très morbide et très glauque sans décalage humoristique.

33452562.review:
非常好的一款解谜游戏。首先就游戏的解密内容来说，整体上难度适中，并没有什么太烧脑的地方。而且最后的金牌隐藏关卡解密十分有趣。不过我在Rose那关发现了一个bug？应该是汉化组的问题。其次，游戏尤其注重剧情，就像介绍所说，这是一个让你在游玩过程中建立自己的家庭的游戏。游戏从James死去的叔叔开始讲述，叙述了James子孙两代的故事。尽管这是逃离方块里面的一部分，但是又可以看做一个独立的游戏。而且游戏中注意个别人物的塑造。比如全作中性格最鲜明的Albert。他杀死了自己的兄嫂，把外甥推进枯井，又让姐姐伤心而自杀。可以说他造成了全家的不幸。但是他又极大促进了复活James叔叔计划的实施。是游戏中不可或缺的人物。可惜James死得太早，Mary也不明不白，不然Albert和他们也可能会有冲突发生。最后，树形结构的关卡也让人感觉耳目一新，游戏的画风也清新脱俗（你够了），在正常的关卡之后还有隐藏关卡，让你回到最开始，研究James叔叔的死因。
下面说说缺点。就像我所说的，游戏整体难度适中，但是有些关卡简直没有难度，有些关卡与解密联系不大，还有些关卡难度设置莫名其妙，简直成了科幻游戏，找不到逻辑联系。并且金牌关卡的有趣仅仅在于其解密性，与剧情联系不大。而根源的最终关卡简直是化学考试，需要你背下一大堆的化合反应方程式才行。而且假如你想要全成就的话，那还需要背更多。一个游戏假如不给你合成表让你自己摸索的话，可能会把人烦死。所以最后隐藏关卡显得有点狗尾续貂。不过瑕不掩瑜，这款游戏还是一款相当不错的游戏。可惜它的前作和续作均和它联系不大，也不能引起我去游玩的兴趣。所以这个系列只给我奉献了一款好游戏，也是十分可惜。

33450954.review:
利用2个工作日的间隙终于通关了，比起前作Hotel这个真的好长啊~
打折入了真的是超级划算，赞美作者的脑洞（小蝌蚪什么的天朝肯定不能上线）
和前作比加了成就，但是很多成就必须重新开始才能收集，简直是这个系列的通病，等以后有机会再补吧。
偶尔点窗户之类的突然出现的黑影之类的一惊一乍，还好上班没带耳机，不然估计吓个半死。
谜题种类超多，融合地很完美，不会像puzzle agent那种一言不合就出题的不协调感，很期待下一部作品。
学习了花体字的写法，也就记住了该死的家族是叫Vanderboom,而不是Vanderloom。

33406988.review:
[b]Overall: 8/10[/b]
A rollercoaster of a lucid dream.

Rusty Lake: Roots is an old school point and click puzzle game that follows the story of the Vanderboom family, in attempt to piece together all its oddball fragments and slow moving episodic epiphanies into a coherent whole; much of it stemming from time itself -- past lives, present realities, age, death and rebirth... Not giving any spoilers. The little snippets of voice acting aren't the best, but the Twin Peaks-esque story itself definitely makes up for it in my opinion, making it more than worth the price, grasping your attention as you play through with an addictive mix of well-paced macabre and surreal schizophrenic experiences.

33403758.review:
Сюр, мистика, наркомания, убийства. Теперь еще и с алхимией! В общем, все то, за что я люблю эту серию игр, здесь присутствует. Отдельно радует сюжет длиной в 4 часа минимум и разноплановость головоломок.

Смело берите, если тоже хотите воскресить пра пра пра... пра... (ну вы поняли) дедушку, поиграть в диванного алхимика, много раз подряд подорваться на гранате, пропутешествовать через сосок трупа, выпить кружечку собачьей мочи, научиться убивать куклами вуду и сто раз обматерить всех вокруг, прежде чем сообразить, как работают долбаные голуби.

10 Альбертов из 10.

33395039.review:
总评：一款出色的恐怖解谜游戏，画面和配乐相得益彰，再加上不时出现的无预警高能，使得游戏整体呈现出很棒的诡异气氛。谜题的难度适中，并且官方提供了各个谜题的攻略，所以即使是不擅长解谜游戏的玩家也可以尽情地享受故事的情节。

剧情梗概：因为没有玩过其他相关作品，所以可能存在某些纰漏或者错误之处。。。
James的叔叔William离奇去世，James作为合法继承人来到的叔叔的宅邸，并继承了叔叔所有的遗产，他将一颗种子种在了院子里。James在时钟内找到了叔叔的尸体，并得到了叔叔的[u]心脏[/u]。随后James与Mary结婚生子，诞下了三胞胎，分别是Emma、Samuel和Albert，Emma和Samuel对Albert态度并不友好，由于两人恶作剧，导致Albert毁了容，Albert也从此对二人记恨在心。James意外发现了叔叔两兄弟研究永生药的笔记，他配置出了永生药，并喝了下去，却因此死亡，死后的James其[u]舌头[/u]也被拿走。
多年以后，Emma，Samuel和Albert三人都长大了。Emma因为花粉飞入身体，而生下了儿子Frank，但是因为Albert怀恨在心，所以趁Frank在荡秋千的时候，害他掉进了井里；Emma以为儿子已经死去，伤心欲绝，终于在写下一封遗书之后，便上吊自尽了，她临死前的[u]眼泪[/u]被收集。Samuel则与占卜师Ida结婚，并生下孩子Leonard。Samuel，Ida，Leonard和Albert一起为年老的Mary演奏乐曲，曲终，年老的Mary死去，她的[u]牙齿[/u]被取走，而Samuel，Ida和Albert也不知所终，只剩下了Leonard。原来是Albert以傀儡术杀死了Samuel和Ida，并取走了[u]两人的眼睛[/u]。虽然Albert杀死了Ida，但他同时也深爱着Ida，于是他用自己和Ida的种子制造出了一个孩子Rose。
又过了很多年，Leonard，Frank和Rose也长大了。Leonard参了军，却在战场上被炸断了右脚，其[u]右脚[/u]也被拿走，断了腿的Leonard回到宅邸，并在院子里找到[u]铜制怀表[/u]。Rose救出了一直生活在井底的Frank，Frank向Albert复仇，并取走了Albert的[u]大脑[/u]，而Frank自己的[u]须发[/u]也被剪下保存；Frank终于收到了母亲Emma临死前写下的信，并根据信中的信息找到了[u]银质怀表[/u]。Rose和Frank一起跳舞，却被破损的唱片机扎伤了手指，流出来的[u]血[/u]也被收集下来；随后，Rose在自己家族的墓地里找到了[u]金制怀表[/u]。
至此，三块怀表以及十个祭品均已集齐，Leonard，Frank和Rose三人献上怀表和祭品，成功复活了William，但Leonard和Frank却因此死去，只有Rose活了下来，独自一人抱着新生的William站在锈湖里。。。
（补完：乌鸦男是Willian的弟弟；William的死因是喝下了永生药；在死去的William体内找到了神秘的树种。）

33379064.review:
I played this right after finishing Rusty Lake Hotel. Although Rusty Lake: Roots referenced Rusty Lake Hotel, I should have played Rusty Lake: Roots first because it was [i]wonderful[/i]. The puzzle design was much better and the various scenes were more linear, in a good way - unlike in Rusty Lake Hotel, you didn't find yourself having to replay a scene (or the whole game) because you hadn't done things exactly right.

I originally only intended to play this for a little bit and then go to bed, but the characters and story completely grabbed me. Unlike Rusty Lake Hotel, I actually found Rusty Lake: Roots to be a bit creepy, and the incredibly messed up relationships and Vanderboom family history had me hooked. It also didn't hurt that most of the puzzles were relatively easy to figure out and the harder ones usually weren't so hard that my frustration outweighed my enjoyment.

My biggest complaint is that the sliding controls were occasionally glitchy for me. However, it helped that the game still included buttons I could click to slide left or right within a particular scene.

Edit: I nominated this for Steam's 2017 "Haunts My Dreams" award because this game stuck with me for weeks after I finished it. I even went out and methodically played through all the related Cube Escape games on my phone so that I could learn more of the overall story.

33338239.review:
환생과 불로장생의 영약에 관한 가족 이야기

플레이 시간 : 3.4시간

가성비 : 높음

몰입도 : 다소 높음

난이도 : 쉬움~다소 어려움

큐브 이스케이프 시리즈의 일환으로 본다면 새로운 사실이 많이 밝혀지는 게임이다. 시리즈와 따로 떼어놓고 본다고 해도 전혀 손색이 없다. 게임 자체가 분량이 크기 때문에 나름의 스토리로 서사 전달이 충분히 가능하기 때문이다. 보통 큐브 이스케이프 시리즈를 하고 이 게임을 하라고 말하는데 사실 큐브 이스케이프 시리즈는 초보자들이 하기에는 꽤 무리가 있는 작품이다. 그냥 엔딩 같은 경우는 나름 쉽게 깰 수 있지만 히든엔딩(진엔딩)의 경우는 공략이 필요하기 때문이다. 물론 자신이 그런 퍼즐에 좀 능력이 있다는 사람은 예외겠지만. 워낙 숨겨진 것들도 많아서 개인적으로는 해석 및 공략이 있는 유튜브로 시리즈를 시청하는 것을 권한다. 

대부분의 퍼즐은 쉽다. 다른 시리즈에 비해서는 확실히 쉽다는 느낌을 받았다. 히든 엔딩을 볼 때가 좀 어려웠다.

33265576.review:
주인공 가족들의 비극적인 이야기를 퍼즐과 함께 풀어나가는 과정이 즐거웠다.

퍼즐 난이도는 전작인 Rusty Lake : Hotel에 비해 별반 차이가 없다. 둘 다 어드벤쳐 장르의 난이도 치곤 쉬운편인데, 힌트가 풀이방법을 반쯤 던져주는 것도 많고, 그렇지 않더라도 약간은 뻔한 풀이방식이라 보자마자 대다수 직관력으로 해결이 가능한 퍼즐들이 많다.

옛날 Sierra사의 고전 어드벤쳐게임들을 생각하면 자비가 있는 수준이다.

만약 여기서 찾은 도구가 다른데서 쓰이거나, 여기서 작동시킨 기계가 다른 곳의 장치에 영향을 주거나 문을 열어주는 방식이라면 맵 전체를 뒤지고 다녀야하기 대문에 플레이타임과 난이도가 급상승한다.

그에 비하면 이 게임은 퍼즐하나당 활동범위가 제한되어있고, 현장에 있는 도구와 힌트들만으로 해결이 가능하기 때문에 한가할 때 머리쓰는 IQ테스트 문제(IQ 테스트라고 하기도 민망한 간단한 것들도 많음) 40문제 가량 푼다고 생각하고 가벼운 마음으로 즐길 수 있다.개인적으로 중요시 하는 것은 가성비인데, 게임도 재밋고 완성도도 나쁘지 않으며 3300원에 5~6시간 즐겁게 보낼 수 있기 때문에 매우 추천한다. 세일할 때 사면 1500원 수준이기 때문에 더더더욱더 추천한다.

Because the game made with flash player, i encounter some bugs when picking up some items or when in between scene  transition. Not a game breaking bug, but still annoying at some point. 

9/10 - A great point and click game, need more long story instead short story for each game.

33042771.review:
刚刚通了全关，也包括那隐藏九大关卡…
顿时感触颇深，千言万语化作一副完整的时间表，可供参考
（囊括RustLake公司全作品）

1860年（及以前）乌鸦先生和他的兄弟威廉姆在自己家地下室调制长生不老药，威廉姆人身死亡，意识变成大黑形态，乌鸦先生坦言此时他已经认识并服务于猫头鹰先生了。
1860年威廉姆的侄子James来到宅子并继承它，种下了乌鸦先生留给他的一颗种子。
1865年James与Mary相恋。
1867年Mary诞下三个孩子Albert、Emma、Samuel。
1870年James用望远镜看见锈湖旅馆，里面有在20多年后被哈维杀的五个客人和乌鸦先生。
James发现地下室，根据叔叔们留下的笔记做出长生不老药，给狗喝了狗没事，自己喝了当场死亡。
1876年James的三个孩子结怨，Albert想干死其他两个，乌鸦先生出现，预言了他们将来的悲惨命运，以及他们会留下的遗产（器官）。
1879大黑修复了他自己生前的雕像，并且得到James的舌头。
1884年Emma种花，怀孕？？
1885年Albert得到几个可以改变天气的魔法面具，杀死一只蝴蝶。
1888年阿尔勒。
1889年Samuel在修钟是遇见占卜师Ida，相恋。
Ida在宅子外进行占卜。
1891年Albert推Emma儿子Frank下井，Emma给儿子写了一封信，给了一只鸟（好像是哈维）。
1893年哈维在旅馆中杀死了五个客人，提取黑方块。
1894年五个客人越狱，哈维变鸟飞走。
1895年Ida和Samuel结婚，家族合影。
1896年Emma上吊自杀。
家族成员玩谎言游戏，透露Albert爱着Ida。乌鸦先生送给了Albert一个诅咒用羊头面具。
1904年家族成员演奏交响乐，Mary死去，Albert带走Samuel和Ida，用羊头面具杀死他们。
1909年Albert用炼金术（？）制造他和Ida的女儿。
1914年Samuel夫妇的儿子Leonard上战场。
1918年Leonard负伤回家，梦境中出现了鹿先生的大黑，乌鸦先生，还有一对男女（不知是谁）。
1919年Albert的女儿Rose与威廉姆的大黑交流，得知威廉姆想要复活，并且需要时间碎片，Rose表示会帮助他。
1920年Rose救出井中的Frank，我们用捕兽夹在平地上捉住了一条鱼……类似的剧情在生日中也出现过。
1926年Frank杀死Albert。
1929年Leonard挖宝获得时间碎片。
1930年Frank获得母亲的信，找到时间碎片。
1932年Rose挖坟拼出一个人的遗骨，得到时间碎片。
1933年Frank和Rose跳舞，获得女主的裙子。
1935年威廉姆用家族成员的器官和剩下的时光成员的记忆碎片进行人体炼成（？）结尾的时候Rose抱着疑似女主的婴儿站在锈湖中，手拿着女主的裙子。女主可能是威廉姆的转世。
1939年侦探九岁生日。收到了哈维送的贺卡。一只白兔突突突了他们全家仅侦探和一只猫活了下来，侦探用蓝方块逆转时间，侦探的爷爷一枪反杀白兔。
1964年四季之春。
1969年女主去了锈湖疗养院，被魔法阵坑害招来大黑，后逆转时空用新的魔法阵驱赶了大黑。
同年，哈维进行紧张刺激的盒内逃脱，最后用会发光的苍蝇（我才不承认那是萤火虫）击退了盒子外的大黑，注意，这个大黑在被打中之后似乎张开了翅膀，可能是锈湖旅馆中的鸽子。
1971年四季之夏。
同年四季之秋，女主杀死哈维，女主死亡。
（以下这部分牵涉到多部时间线相近的作品，会有些乱）
侦探前来调查女主的死亡，与乌鸦先生通话，得知侦探的姓氏和锈湖边那个家族的姓氏相似但不同。女主的尸体被传送到了磨坊。
剧院虽然是1972年侦探进了电梯才发生的，但是他穿越到的时间是1971年女主死之后，女主的男朋友（？）Bob在酒吧喝闷酒，酒保是乌鸦先生客串的。
侦探完成了六幕戏，哈维一直在这里，猫头鹰先生也是。
第一幕，山鸡小姐的歌唱。
第二幕，锈色森林，大概是锈湖底的那片森林。
第三幕，哈维和鱼的故事。这鱼会飞，终于知道那个平地夹鱼是咋回事了。
第四幕，乌鸦先生爱跳舞。
第五幕，女主之死（怎么又死了……）
第六幕，风车。
Bob变成大黑。
回到二十三号案件，侦探在自己办公室里，Bob被当成嫌疑人抓起来，然后变成大黑反杀看守的警察。侦探找到了黑白方块，被猫头鹰先生的神秘力量带到了锈湖边的教堂。
乌鸦先生带侦探上岛，侦探在鹿先生大黑的追杀下乘电梯下到锈湖底的房间。
乌鸦先生来到洞穴，里面有只狗，好像是James喂了长生不老药的那一只。猫头鹰先生以人类形态被困在潜水服里。锈湖旅馆里的猫蝠服务生也在。
洞穴里有一本书。
第一页是根源里的家族，由此可以确定女主确实是家族后人。本人英语渣，加上书上的字体太难辨识，翻译可能有误，大概写的是威廉姆是长生不老药最后的制作者。
第二页是侦探，侦探是“旅行者”它告诉我们，女主记忆中提取出的黑白方块+蓝色的时间方块=金方块，而在游戏最后乌鸦先生也确实合成了金方块交给了侦探。
第三页，乌鸦先生，还有四种方块的注释，白：重新经历你的过去。黑：面对你心中的恶魔。蓝：过往用不消逝，甚至从未过去。金：记忆不仅是过去的钥匙……它通往未来。
第四页，女主叫Raura，“再生的意识”，右边几句话翻译翻得我想吐。
锈湖精神健康和钓鱼。
让方块们指引你。
平衡那些你过去生活中的物质。
制造生与死的不老药。
寻找启示。
洞穴里有四幅壁画。
第一幅壁画上确认了女主是威廉姆转世。
第二幅壁画，侦探乘电梯来到湖底，五个客人的大黑在阻拦他，穿着潜水服的猫头鹰先生帮助他进入了一个小屋。
第三幅壁画，乌鸦先生开着滚筒洗衣机在锈湖中游玩的故事。
第四幅壁画，剧院中出现过的类似的轮盘。
最后乌鸦先生救了猫头鹰先生，看着滚筒洗衣机在锈湖里寻找材料，来到锈湖旅馆底层的白色房间，合成金色方块交给侦探，女主以大黑形态也在这里。
侦探乘电梯向上升，经历了生日与剧院，他在人类和大黑两种形态中挣扎着，据猫头鹰先生称，他的灵魂在向更高层次迈进。
1981年四季之冬，女主回到过去救了哈维。

【时间表转载自贴吧，作者ID可靠的xzmxzm】佩服作者，实在是……够闲的…

33028548.review:
高质量的猎奇风解密游戏。
pros：
    -猎奇诡异的画风
    -超自然的背景
    -跌宕曲折的剧情
    -丰富的关卡
    -难度适宜又有趣的谜题
    -超赞的soundtrack
cons：
    暂无
   
   rusty lake大包打折，两个游戏才十块钱，趁机入了。一玩才发现好口碑实至名归。如果说一作rusty lake关卡太少而剧情单薄让人不过瘾的话，那么其续作rusty lake:roots绝对让人满意。
   和上一作玩法相同，本作最大的两点在于由家族树串联起来的剧情。从每个关卡开头的年份，我们可以整理出一个清晰完整的故事线（详见知乎问答，有联系两作以及cube escape的完整剧情）。本作故事包含复仇、谋杀、献祭、自杀，是一个非常符合我胃口的黑暗超自然故事。偶尔有jump scare以及几个略为血腥的场面，不过完全构不成“恐怖”，害怕恐怖游戏的玩家可以放心食用。虽然没有中文，但游戏流程里基本用不上文字，因此英文苦手也可以安心剁手。
   游戏中我最喜欢也是觉得最悲伤的一段是Emma坐在望远镜前寻找自己的儿子，桌上放着一封信：
Dear son:
      I have been looking for you for so long. If you find this letter,look for me in the stars,
                                                                                                                                                                Your mother
   令人动容。
   9/10.

33006078.review:
[b]The Rusty Lake games[/b] (obviously including the Cube Escape ones) are some of the best indie-puzzle-horror games out there. Now let me explain:
[First thing first before you read this review you should know that all Rusty Lake Games are kinda horror games which means that their intention is not to scare the crap out of you but to use the horror aspect in order to intrigue you and trust me they do it VERY well. ]
The events that take place at the so-called Rusty Lake are going to amaze you. If you have played the prequels/sequels you know what I mean. If not just [url=http://www.cubeescape.com]http://www.cubeescape.com[/url] or download the games at iOS and Android.
Most indie-horror games that have a success like these ones are combining immersive storyline and puzzles that are just there, not too hard, not too easy but once you pass even the most simple puzzle you instantly feel rewarded as the story continues BUT without using jump-cuts/ cinematics etc so you don't get distracted or told what to do. Now to list these and some other thing pros & cons
[b]Pros[/b]
Good Gameplay
Amazing Storyline
Ridiculously good art-style 
Good Music 

[b]Cons[/b]
The music even though it's good might get a little repetitive especially when stuck in a puzzle
.
.
.
that's it

Rusty Lake: Roots

All in all they are all great games 10/10 i luv it and btw i got the roots game free because there was a free givaway for a milestone they hit.

32936632.review:
Hello, my name is Ms Parrot.  Welcome to Rusty Lake: Roots.  It is part of the Cube Escape series.  Here we see the Vanderboom Family Tree and can watch how it grows.  It starts out quite small but is very large before the end.  You will see pieces of the family's lives and if you have played Cube Escape you will recognize many faces.

First is James.  He isn't the oldest and certainly not the first you may have met but as he moves in to the house so too are you eased in to the game.  Just like the Hotel there is a dream-like quality to each of their lives.  A horrific logic that makes terrible things seem completely sensible.  There will be blood and things may be difficult but there is no reason to fear.  Whether you know or not the full events of Cube Escape you will find more than you bargined for here with a memorable experience.  The past is not the past here.  The family secrets can be hard to spot at times but a little effort will take you to their roots.

If you played Rusty Lake Hotel then you know what to do.

전작인 Rusty Lake Hotel 보다는 볼륨도 길어지고 퍼즐의 난이도 또한 확실히 올라갔습니다. 하지만 마지막 퍼즐을 제외하고는 다른 무료 버젼의 게임들과 비교해 보면 퍼즐이 많이 어렵지는 않은것 같아요.  스토리텔링 역시 좋아진 것을 확인할 수 있었습니다. 전작들이 전공서적과 같이 스토리에 난해한 면이 있었다면(프레디의 피자가게처럼) 이번 작품은 마치 한 편의 소설을 읽는 느낌을 받을 수 있었습니다.

點擊互動式解謎，關卡制

收集品，物品組合，益智，天馬行空的創意，獵奇

一般

無

前期一般，中後期第１０關開始困難。難度在於線索的發掘，解謎的邏輯原理

簡單

順暢

高。娛樂性在於各種奇妙的展開，加上有趣帶點困難的解謎，附加獵奇趣味（疑？

無

－５０％，NT＄４６

32690882.review:
Если Rusty Lake не добавила пару трещин в мою психику, то как минимум подарила пару идей моему внутреннему маньяку. Увлекательная история с крайне неординарной подачей. Последнее, зачастую, отпугивает многих от углубленного знакомства с серией игр Cube Escape. А зря.

Перед вашими глазами разыграется настоящая драма одного семейства. Раскрывайте их тайны, вынимайте скелеты из шкафов (иногда буквально) и наблюдайте, как они страдают раз за разом. Порадуйте внутреннего садиста. Кстати о нем: немало тех, кто ругает игру за излишнюю жестокость, кровавость и нездоровые в целом картины. Лично меня это удивляет. Разумеется, нельзя отказать Rusty Lake в атмосферности – чувство некоего напряжения действительно преследует на протяжении всего процесса. Но заявлять, что суть игры – кровавая баня … Ну, нет. Так, пара затей на тему альтернативной анатомии и эзотерики.

Интересная и несложная головоломка, которая больше поражает своей историей, нежели сложностью загадок. При общей простоте она производит довольно сильный эффект, а какой именно – зависит от вас.

32622399.review:
Roots – это вторая игра серии Rusty Lake. Она не связана с предыдущей игрой, так что можете сначала пройти эту игру, а уж потом покупать первую часть. 
Вы играете за молодого человека, который получает в наследство дом и сажает дерево… Вам предстоит узнать историю отдельно взятой семьи в трёх поколениях и нарисовать их генеалогическое древо. 
Сама игра состоит из решения различных мини-игр, некоторые очень сложные. Иногда придется воспользоваться прохождением, которое разработчик добавил в игру. 
Мне очень понравилась необычная рисовка игры. Графика игры находится на очень высоком уровне, для такой малой стоимости. Музыка помогает создать мрачную атмосферу. В игре есть субтитры на русском языке, это очень помогает при разгадке загадок. 
Коллекционные карточки присутствуют, они выпадают примерно часов через пять. Достижения в игре не очень сложные и реальны к выполнению.
Рекомендую людям с устойчивой психикой и не боящимся вида крови.
Оценка 10/10

32603636.review:
[b]NOTE: I HIGHLY RECOMMEND PLAYING THE DEVELOPER'S CUBE ESCAPE SERIES BEFORE BUYING THIS GAME. THEY ARE GREAT ALTHOUGH A LITTLE LESS POLISHED DEMONSTRATIONS OF WHAT TO EXPECT FROM THIS GAME. YOU CAN FIND THEM FOR FREE AT THE DEVELOPER'S WEBSITE OR APP STORE OF YOUR CHOICE.[/b]


[b]Rusty Lake: Roots[/b] is a point-and-click adventure that is equal parts thrilling and intriquing with a healthy doze of dark humour. It follows the story of the Vanderboom family over generations in a plot that feels mystical, maybe even confusing at first, but rewards you whole heartedly for making sense of it.



The gameplay is what it is. There is not much to praise or criticize as is usual with games that rely very little on mechanics. It's worth noting however that the game was clearly designed with touch screens in mind. The circles that form around your mouse with every click and the way some of the objects in the world are interracted with may be a bit jarring at times, but nothing that would take away from the experience. One thing that I found surprisingly pleasing however was the complete absence of in-inventory item mixing. This may sound like an unnecessary simplification, but in practice it makes a noticeable chunck of the puzzles much smoother experiences as you always have the things that need to be interracted with right in front of you.



With that, almost ironically, given the game's themes, clarity is where the game shines. The infuriating moments where you don't know where or what to do are few and far between. While the artstyle isn't anything spectacular from a purely aesthetic view, it works wonders in telling you what is happening, what to do and what you can work with. A respectable feat once you realize just how bizzare and surreal the scenes and puzzles can get.


The real reason to play this game, and the thriving force that keeps you hooked, is the narrative.
 The world of Rusty Lake is a fantastic example of the kind of storytelling that only video games can pull off and still make for a thoroughly compelling story. In the world of Rusty Lake the past is never dead, it's not even the past and we are always here in our past and future lives. Time is not a matter of concern and neither is the order in which you play the games, as they all work to answer questions from other games in the series and asks new ones for the rest to unravel. In this way, the family tree of Rusty Lake: Roots is almost like a microcosm of the series as a whole, with it's splitting branches that all come together in the end to form a story without ever having to do as much but wink at the player from time to time.

32313591.review:
한 가문의 기괴하고도 막장스러운 이야기를 선보이는 게임.

러스티 레이크 호텔과 더불어 큐브 이스케이프 시리즈의 프리미엄 격에 해당하는 작품이다. 큐브 이스케이프 시리즈로써는 상당히 최신작에 속하는 작품이기 때문에 시리즈 전체를 대표한다고 보기는 어렵지만, 그래도 시리즈의 정체성은 아주 잘 보여주는 작품이다. 러스티 레이크 루츠만 플레이해서는 이해하기 어려운 부분이 적지 않을텐데, 궁금하다면 다른 시리즈들은 직접 찾아 플레이해보는 것이 좋다.

제임스로부터(혹은 그 이전부터) 시작된 한 가문의 파란만장한 흥망성쇠를 다룬 게임이다. 한 가문을 다루는 게임이 늘 그렇듯, 역시나 줄거리는 아주 막장스럽게 흘러간다. 대사가 거의 없고 장면의 전환도 빠른데다가 다른 시리즈와 연계되는 부분이 적지 않기 때문에 게임의 내용을 완벽히 이해하기 쉽지는 않다. 그래도 줄거리의 흐름에 크게 어색한 부분은 없고, 중간에 분기가 갈라지고 다시 연결되는 과정도 자연스러워 몰입도는 괜찮은 편이다.

나름 공포 요소가 존재하는 게임이니만큼, 중간중간 잔인한 연출도 등장하고 고어한 광경도 많이 나온다. 다만 초장부터 대놓고 분위기도 음침하게 형성해놓고 누구라도 놀랄만한 확실한 지점을 정해둔 다른 공포게임들과는 다르게, 러스티 레이크 루츠는 상대적으로 무서운 분위기도 덜하고 연출의 임팩트도 적은 편이다. 다만 무섭고 외설적인 요소들이 굉장히 자연스러운 것 마냥 표현되는데, 보다보면 이걸 무서워해야할지 어떻게 받아들여야할지 판단이 잘 안서서 기분이 굉장히 이상해질 때가 있다. 어쨌든 여러모로 다른 공포 게임들과는 분위기가 살짝 다른 게임이다.

게임의 난이도는 적절한 편이다. 대체로 눈에 띄는 곳에 힌트도 있고 해야할 것을 인식하기도 어렵지 않다. 물론 중간중간 난해한 힌트가 없는 건 아니긴 하다만, 이 게임은 비범하게도 게임 메뉴에서 유튜브 공략을 볼 수 있는 기능이 존재한다. 정말 모르겠으면 과감히 공략 참조해가며 진행해도 좋다. 게임의 진행에 있어서는 크게 막힐 일은 없을 게임. 다만 일부 도전과제의 경우 한 번 놓치면 게임을 다시 시작하지 않는 한 절대 달성할 수 없으니, 도전과제를 노린다면 이 점을 주의해야 할 것이다.

다른 공포 게임들과는 상당히 이질적인 분위기를 보이면서도, 실제 게임플레이는 별달리 흠잡을 곳 없이 탄탄함을 보여주는 게임이다. 어드벤처 게임으로써도 참 좋은 게임이며, 한글화도 잘 되어있는 만큼 큐브 이스케이프 시리즈(혹은 러스티 레이크 시리즈) 입문작으로도 추천해 줄 수 있는 게임이다.

32307743.review: "Rusty Lake: Roots" is an entertaining (and cheap!) collection of "locked room" style puzzles that involves not only looking for objects, but also figuring out puzzles and the occasional math equation. The game's imagery (actually, the Rusty Lake series as a whole) might seem a tad weird and convoluted, but in more of an entertaining "Twin Peaks-esque" way than "this is going to give me nightmares". Aside from looks, the only other thing that I think might turn people away from this game is the length; it'll vary depending on one's problem-solving skills, of course, but expect it to be short, with the only 'replayability' once you solve the final puzzle being the new (as of this Review's posting) Achievements. With that said, personally, I thought the experience lasted just as long as it needed to in order to make a good impression on me. I enjoyed this game's atmosphere, and its ability to present a twisted story without heaps of dialogue.  And in the end, not only do I recommend others giving this a try, I also hope that this won't be the last we see of Rusty Lake.

32142372.review:
Bumped into Rusty Lake: Hotel on the steam specials page (sorting from lowest price duh...), I purchased it in the mindset "Meh, its only $2" but was absolutely BLOWN AWAY by the amazing story and quality. Naturally, It was a no-brainer purchasing this. 

The story is absolutely fantastic, always being hinted at but never quite being explained properly. The quality and art style is really nice and quite well suited to the atmosphere of the game. My one and only complaint is it has the tendency to crash sometimes; throughout my 6-ish hour first playthrough, the game crashed about 3 different times. Overall, this game is truly one of the best atmospheric point and click games out there, one which is incredibly underrated. I loved every minute I've spent playing it and cannot wait for some new additions to the series.

32125545.review:

31748668.review:
Disclaimer: Wer Rechtschreib- und Kommafehler findet kriegt ´ne eins und nen Rotstift, muss die Fehler aber behalten und durchfüttern bis zur nächsten Rechtschreibreform. Zum Spiel: 

Oh was für eine hübsche kleine 2,99 € - Perle. Ich bin durch Zufall beim Stöbern im Shop darauf gestoßen und hab´s für den Preis mal einkassiert. Dieser Puzzlekram ist im Prinzip nicht mein Genre, aber das ein oder andere positive Review hat mich dann doch neugierig gemacht und ich dachte mir probier´s halt einfach mal aus. Man hat schließlich schon wesentlich mehr Geld für deutlich größere Grütze ausgegeben. Ich wurde nicht enttäuscht. Einmal angefangen konnte ich nicht mehr aufhören, bis ich komplett fertig war... also mit dem Spiel.. ( dass ich komplett fertig bin, weiß ich schon etwas länger..)  
    
Erzählt wird die Geschichte der, nennen wir´s ruhig mal „leicht dysfunktionalen“ Familie Vanderboom, an der sich wohl auch ein durch jahrelange Betreuung von Assi-TV- Familien gestählter Therapeut die Zähne ausgebissen hätte. 
Der Denver-Clan trifft die Munsters.. Stück für Stück klappert man die Lebensgeschichte einzelner Familienmitglieder ab, indem man diverse Rätsel bearbeitet. Man kann sich die einzelnen Kapitel im Grunde wie einen Escape-Room vorstellen, wo das knacken diverser kleinerer Rätsel schließlich das große Ganze auflöst. 
Bei Erfolg wachsen weitere Äste am Stammbaum und bringen neue, mal mehr mal weniger durchgeknallte Vanderbooms ins Spiel. Zur Geschichte selber halte ich mich aber bedeckt – ich will niemandem etwas spoilern dafür fand ich die Story zu erlebenswert.    

Den Schwierigkeitsgrad zu beschreiben ist..nun ja..schwierig. Mir ist ( bedauerlicherweise persönlich ) die Existenz von Biomaterial  bekannt, für dass das Beenden dieses Spiels wohl eine Lebenaufgabe darstellen würde. Grundsätzlich würde ich das Spiel aber mal als machbar bezeichnen. Von sehr einfach bis knackig schwer ist hier alles dabei und wenn man sich mal komplett festgefranst hat, findet sich sicher irgendwo ein Guide.

Von mir ( vor allem zu dem Preis ) gibt´s hier eine klare Kaufempfehlung. Wenn man mit Spielen dieser Art was anfangen kann, kann man hier definitiv nichts falsch machen.

Have a nice day

Je suis tombée sur Rusty Lake Roots complétement par hasard, et je suis tombée sous le charme/sous l'emprise de ce jeu ! Les graphiques sont très chouettes et dessinent un univers dans lequel on a pas du tout de mal à entrer.
La musique est très appropriée, le thème musical est souvent repris, on se sent inclus dans l'arbre généalogique qui se découvre petit à petit.
Situations un peu malaisantes, qui donnent simplement envie de poursuivre l'histoire pour comprendre !
Seul hic, le système de sauvegarde n'a pas été fonctionnel pour moi, et j'ai du refaire le jeu plusieurs fois de suite, et d'une traite ! Problème ma foi mineur, je l'ai rejoué du debut avec plaisir !

Je recommande si vous aimez le style !!!

31563791.review: Great addition to the Rusty Lake series. It shows a lot of insights about the Vanderboom family and as always it brings more questions than answers, but it's part of the fun. The singular riddles are not particularly difficult except a few ones, but they are many and once you completed the family tree you can dig more by solving a bigger puzzle that spreads among the entire tree. The only complain I have in fact is about the very last puzzle with alchemy, it is way too much random and requires a lot of try and fail to be completed. Other than that, it's all good. Apparently there's even more to be discovered since there's a hidden achievement that cannot be unlocked right now, so we'll be able to pick up this later and continue! Definitely recommend this.

31233857.review:
Completed this nifty little puzzle game just now and wanted to write up a positive review.

This is my first Rusty Lake / Cube Escape game. I found it through my Discovery Queue. I found the overarching story and characters (including the cameos from other games) intriguing enough that I want to play more in the series. The mood and setting is spot-on eerie Victorian with touches of occult, just enough to make you uneasy but not completely revolted while playing.

I found the choice to rely on pictographs, colors and other visual cues over text or dialogue to figure out puzzles a welcome challenge, for the most part. A few times, especially in the later puzzles, it was frustrating enough to figure out what to do next that I went to the Rusty Lake website to look up video tutorials. It's nice the developers make these available (but only look when you're well and truly stuck--otherwise you're ruining the experience for yourself!)

There were several classic puzzles 'reskinned' for the story and theme of the game, and I could also see the 'Escape Room' influence (the first game Rusty Lake made, Cube Escape & its derivatives, is an escape-style game). I've played some Escape Rooms with groups in real life, so I'm curious to see how Cube Escape holds up to that experience.

One last thing, the resolution is kinda small, more suited to tablet than desktop. That didn't bother me, though. I could still easily see and manipulate all parts of the screen.

All in all, even with the small frustrations, I found this game to be well worth its $2.99 price. Go get it if you like puzzle games!

31132374.review:
[h1]10 sacrifices, 1 reborn[/h1]

最早接触这个系列是看女流的视频，Rusty lake系列是属于Cube escape的一个分支，整个系列都是剧情向解谜，由于作品前后剧情多有联动建议完整体验过前作再进行游玩。因为steam上只有Rusty Lake: Hotel和Roots这两作，想要完整地体验这个系列的朋友可以去Cube escape的官网玩前几作。
http://www.rustylake.com/#games
当然就算是把Rusty Lake: Roots当作一部独立解谜作品他的剧情也是有着一定的完整性的，并不会出现情节丢失的情况，对前作不感兴趣的玩家可以放心品尝。

整个游戏包含33个小关卡，以时间顺序进行推进，每个关卡包含一个阶段性小故事，游戏的主题就是一个词“牺牲”。游戏从James继承他叔叔在Rusty Lake的房产开始，遵从着叔叔的遗嘱，James在家的院子里种下了一颗小树。

[h1]落叶归根[/h1]

剧透警告
[spoiler]就像这棵树一样，James整个家族也在这个地方开始扎根，繁衍，直到最后所有人的牺牲成就了一个人的永生，树叶会回归于根部，James家庭子孙延绵后也将回归、汇聚于它们的根。百年的家庭和生活到最后竟然只是为了完成一个邪恶的巫毒献祭仪式，游戏的结局真是让人惊叹不已[/spoiler]

抛开剧情不谈，作为一个解谜游戏，最重要的就是每一个细节之间的关联要有逻辑：如果我看到了一个锁，那么就应该出现一把匹配的钥匙。在这一点上，Rusty Lake系列做的很棒，纵使有些地方有着因为过度艺术化处理而超出现实逻辑的谜题，但总归不会出现“用锤子敲开一个锁”的逻辑。解密所需要关注到的细节都在很明显的地方，道具与谜题之间的关联并不会太过难以分辨。

游戏中经常会出现各种各样无厘头的细节，比如说：
[list]
 [*]用自己喜欢的女孩的鼻血写情书可以增加求婚成功率哦~
 [*]花粉[strike]花的精子[/strike]飞进子宫里就能怀孕！[spoiler]这个好像挺合逻辑的...[/spoiler]
 [*]老爷爷重生后会变成漂亮妹子
[/list]

这种没头没脑的细节在游戏中比比皆是，但它们并不会成为解密的阻碍，反倒是在这恐怖严肃的气氛中平添了一丝“冷幽默”。作者精妙的叙事节奏让一些不必要的要素[spoiler]比如10月怀胎[/spoiler]通过艺术化的模糊处理成为解谜游戏的要素。这一个个搞怪的细节如果仔细地进行推敲又都多少有点逻辑，其中有的包含着纯粹的无厘头，有的深藏着恐怖的事实。正是这些细节让这部作品从各种解谜游戏中脱颖而出，成为脍炙人口的Rusty Lake。

[h1]强烈推荐单人游玩，不容易错失细节而且不会轻易画风突变。[/h1]
[h1]18岁以上心脏病患者请在孩子的陪同下游玩[spoiler]不开玩笑[/spoiler][/h1]

Rusty Lake is a macabre point and click puzzle series. The games themselves have an interconnecting story, but they don’t have to be played in a specific order. The original Cube Escape games can be found online if you are interested in the larger story.

Rusty Lake Roots is the longest Rusty Lake titles on steam. It fallows the story of the Vanderboom family through a couple generations. The game delivers the classic twisted atmosphere of the original Cube Escape games with its usual charm and style. If you’re not sure about this game, I recommend playing the Cube Escape games to find out.

30753683.review:
Serving as a background provider for the game Rusty Lake Hotel and other point and click games of the same developer (which are not available on Steam and I've not played), Rusty Lake Roots explain the origin of the Crowman and the life experiences of his whole family. This game has its own obvious advantages and disadvantages. 

The stationary drawings are still stylish, however, the animation of the characters are somewhat crude and awkward, preventing me from immersing myself into the atmosphere now and then.
The background music is monotonic.
The storyline is quite well-written. The difficulty of the puzzles is moderate, and none of them will get you stuck too long, as far as you carefully observe and consider the scene and clues given to you. But the problem here is that the tempo of story-telling is sometimes retarded by puzzles, that is to say, sometimes you may be forced to solve some irrelevant riddles while you are eager to know more about the plot.

In the end I decide to give it a positive note since its pros surpass cons. If you like other games from the developer, this one will surely impress you.

30680093.review: I've been playing Rusty Lake's Cube Escape series for quite a while now, and I was happy to find this game in the steam store for $3. Not bad for a game that kept me entertained for about 4 hours. The puzzles were a little on the easy side for my taste, but at least there wasn't anything too frustrating either. The creepy, mysterious backstory shared between all the Rusty Lake games is really interesting, and I can't wait to find out more in the next game.

30653561.review: I really enjoy this game. It is both entertaining as well as challenging. I have been out of the gaming world for a very long time (over 7 years) and this was the first game I played coming back into it. I was worried that maybe I had been away too long and that I would not enjoy it any more but being on bed rest while pregnant I needed something to kill the time. This game was a great way to come back. Its just morbid enough to keep me interested in whats coming next, just challenging enough to keep me playing but not so much so that I lost motivation, the tutorials are great if you get stuck and just need a hint for one little thing, you have the ability to just stop and walk away if you have to do something and dont have to worry about getting killed while you are away. It is really a great game, well thought out, decent graphics that match the feel of the game.

手机上玩过前面8部cube escape和锈湖旅馆，依然是恐怖解谜类游戏，剧情偏向于隐晦和魔幻。
这一部由于拆成34个小关卡，难度在系列中偏低，整个游戏就看了satisfiaces（真看不出来是这个）以及最后几个金徽章，不像前面有几部，基本就是看攻略过的。。
这次剧情主要讲了一个家族的故事，有一些《百年孤独》的味道，比起前面几部可以说是叙事方面的大进步。难度下降虽然可能会有人不满，不过我是十分欢迎的。
+优秀的剧情脉络
+适当难度的解谜
+疯狂诡异的风格
+填了几个坑，最重要的乌鸦先生的来历
+最后的炼金术挺好玩的
总评：9.5分
不容错过的优秀解谜游戏，感兴趣的可以看看这里，有系列的时间线和故事分析 https://www.douban.com/review/8328559/

30188881.review:
Following in the stylistc footsteps of the original Rusty Lake, this wonderfully macabre puzzle game is actually 33 small, compatmentalized puzzles that come together. Each one is a delight to play with a cutout style, dark music, and delightfully dark humor. 

Unlike the original Rusty Lake, which had some really gross puzzle solutions, Roots is a bit more toned down. Other reviewers have said that it you're squeamis you should avoid this, but I don't necessarily agree with that. Yes, moments are dark, but a lot of those moments are made lighter simply by the utter absurdity of the situation. Other situation that  seem to be really dark and gloomy end up being ridiculously silly when you get to see the actual results of what happened.

Each section can be completed in a few minutes. In fact, most are relatively straightforward as long as you make sure to check everything and click everywhere. Some of the puzzles require a significant bit of brain power, but the solution is actually quite logical in how it's handled. It's simply a matter of recognizing how to put the pieces together. Fortunately, the folks at Rust Lake have complete walkthrough videos available if you really get stumped.

This game is dark, macabre, funny, challenging, and downright silly all wrapped up into one. If you like dark humor (and, yes, the focus there is on humor even if it's simply absurdity) and you like puzzle games, you need to try this game.

30164969.review: this game is fantastic, with many minilevels compiling an intruiging plot with great diversity of puzzles, delightful aesthetics and as eerie an atmosphere as can be. rusty lake always makes the best point and click "escape the room" and with their newest steam additions they show how they can use the same mechanics and aethstetics with minor goal tweak and still release another wonderful creation that fits in theme and genre to the rest of their games and as original and suprising as ever, 22/22 major arcanas is my rating for this work of art

30067787.review:
"Rusty Lake: Roots" is a delightfully twisted addition to the Cube Escape/Rusty Lake series.  Featuring a variety of puzzles of a range of difficulties (including a set of puzzles to solve after the initial game is completed), this game follows the lives of the Vanderboom family, through courtships, births, rivalries, and death.  Incredibly creepy and not for the extremely squeamish.  (I will never look at voodoo dolls the same way again... ditto for "test tube babies.")

If you're already a fan of the series, you'll appreciate the various nods to previous installments; if you've never played any of the games in the series, you won't miss out on much (and may even be interested in trying out the free previous installments).  Either way, this game is worth the low price and is sure to keep you entertained!

29243223.review:
故事构建、角色塑造都非常巧妙，本质上是一层层类似于密室逃脱的游戏模式

但因为故事的串联、丰富的背景设置而显得非常有趣耐玩

需要动脑的地方，逻辑设定也恰到好处，至少不会让人到想要抓狂的程度，耐心一点总能解答成功

但故事本身抑郁、魔幻，而且带有一些邪教的意味，这让人更有挖掘和考究相关资料的欲望

推荐通关之后对故事整体了解还不深的人看看这个视频：

【http://www.bilibili.com/video/av7451097/】（隐藏在《锈湖根源》深处的秘密）

依然有让人悲伤之处的，比如Emma写给失踪孩子的信，以及那副反射自己悲哀命运的画，

而画上面的旁观者，正是Emma绝望之际所看见的家族之间的关系——每个人都是他人冷漠的旁观者

整个家族的存在和延续只是走进了命运预设的轨道，也让人在接近尾声时

再次开始怀疑人类之间血亲关系的设定——

我们被血亲之树联结在一起，而这种血亲关系，能敌过自然的欲望吗

————————————————————————————————————
PS：隐藏关卡绞尽脑汁也解锁了，炼金任务也完成了

我连鸡尾酒都调配出来了，为什么还是没有解锁成就？

所以这个游戏的隐藏成就到底是什么有人知道吗？

29151835.review:
Un juego de mente

Rusty Lake: Roots es una pequeña aventura gráfica "point & click" un tanto peculiar.
A primera vista puede sorprender que un juego de terror tenga este estilo visual como un lienzo de colores lozanos, pero realmente no es terror en sí, más bien se puede definir como perturbador, macabro y demencial.  
El juego nos cuenta la historia de una familia de mentes insanas durante varias generaciones, a través de esta narrativa de 33 escenas se nos presentan los puzles. En estas visiones teatrales nuestro cerebro deberá trabajar duro pues, muchos de estos estupendos enigmas requerirán toda nuestra lógica y atención. Incluso para algunos puzles te será de ayuda tomar notas y hacer pequeños esquemas. 
Su duración es breve, pero su precio es mínimo. Si presumes de destreza intelectual en un par de sesiones lo habrás terminado. Su apartado sonoro es bueno, algunas melodías conseguirán que entremos en ese punto de intranquilidad.

Lo mejor: estilo artístico perturbador, puzles variados y realmente buenos. 
Lo peor: no está totalmente traducido al castellano, la solución de algunos puzles exigen un nivel de inglés básico.

29149352.review: As always, a solid room escape game, possibly the best in the series so far.

It's truly a great and beautiful storyline they have going with the Rusty Lake series.  I hope that they continue to make these games for a very long time.

28965802.review:
I liked it.
Pros:
+No puzzle was too hard so as to prevent progress for extended periods, allowing easy advancement of the story, while still being difficult enough so as to provoke some thought
+story was strong enough to get invested in 
+some characters were actually quite likeable, considering how no one actually used words, and others were easy to hate. Every story needs a good villain, though, right?

Cons:
-While the puzzles were somewhat difficult, after a few minutes of thinking and trial-and-error, they were all solvable. So, i guess this game is not the most challenging
-This one isnt really Rusty Lakes fault, but this game has a little less replay value than others. Thats just how these sort of games turn out if you have a memory for puzzles. 

Neutral:
-The soundtrack is memorable, but not outstanding
-the game is not incredibly long, but not exactly finish-in-two-hours either
- The price is fair, but if you're strapped for cash, wait for a sale.

Final rating: 8..3/10

28932271.review:
Čekala jsem sice čistě pokračování Rusty Lake Hotel, ale mám dojem, že jsem dostala něco lepšího. A pár narážek na osazenstvo hotelu tam taky bylo. 
Co se Roots týče, fungují podobně jako hotel, totiž omezují se na malé pokoje, ve kterých jsou ke splnění jednotlivé úkoly. Velmi pozitivně vidím to, že nebylo třeba hru ukládat a přesto se dalo mezi jednotlivými "levely" střídat, aniž bych přišla o postup. Taky jsem na sebe celkem pyšná, nápovědu jsem potřebovala dohromady jenom 5x (třikrát během hry a dvakrát v poslední části, tam už to mozeček nějak nedával). S tím se pojí také to, že nápověda je poskytnuta přímo od tvůrců ve formě videí, takže nemůže být pochyb o tom, co má člověk jako další udělat. 

Až na pár míst s klikacími sekvencemi, ke kterým jsem nebyla schopná najít instrukce (a nebo žádné nebyly) jsem byla opravdu schopná samostatně postupovat hrou. Uzavřené prostory, ve kterých se jednotlivé části odehrávaly, byly velkou pomocí, protože bylo jasné, zda ještě něco chybí, nebo jestli už je hotovo. Nenastala žádná frustrace, navíc, pokud se mi nedařilo v konkrétním levelu pokračovat, mohla jsem ho opustit a věnovat se jinému. 

Pevně doufám, že Rusty Lake bude pokračovat, protože takovéhle hry se mi opravdu líbí.

Rozsáhlejší recenze se nachází na zing.cz

28930855.review: 游戏玩了不到六个小时通关 ，这是一款很棒的解密游戏，是我喜欢的游戏类型，而且它里面的故事不是一周目就可懂的，需要多玩几次。除此之外有一点小缺点，不熟悉英文艺术字书写的话真的看不懂里面的英文。。尤其是里面那个VANDERBOOM，看上去明明就是VANDENLOOM好吗……还有S写的像A…总而言之，单纯从游戏性来说，我推荐这个游戏，但是如果要花这么多钱来买，那就不推荐了

28927000.review:
It's tough to tell whether Rusty Lake: Roots is trying for dark or humorous, but it fails on both counts.  Where the original game was amusing and twisted, this game presents a series of tedious puzzles, most too simple to be interesting and many disgusting beyond good taste. My sense of humor is dark, but feeding a placenta to the dog and sending down a mug of urine to the trapped nephew... seriously?  [And for the love of all logic... why is the aunt okay with giving her nephew a mug of dog urine instead of water, but insists on cooking the fish before giving it to him? The only answer seems to be so that the game designers could create a pointless fish-cooking puzzle combined with a gross-out moment.]

The game explores the background story of the family that is tied to the Rusty Lake Hotel.  Suffice to say that the family's story is dark and twisted, but fails to be entertaining.  A few of the puzzles were interesting, but the majority were too simple to be interesting.  The original game had me laughing out loud and left me wanting to play through it a second time.  Unfortunately, this second installment left me rather depressed and perplexed.  Some stories just aren't worth exploring, and this is one of them.
28927000.developer_response: Hi Isatteacher, thanks for your review and sorry to hear you didn't like this one! There is quite some dark humour (and maybe disgusting) things in Hotel too (remember the sandwhich), but maybe it feels different if you play with animals than human. Rusty Lake Hotel isn't the original game, just our first premium game you also have the Cube Escape games which you can check out on our website for free.

Creepy things stand out more in an environment because you're not automatically expecting it, and Rusty Lake: Roots does a good job subverting these expectations.

28899425.review:
Une merveille. 

Point & click à l'ancienne avec une direction artistique simple mais efficace. Mais ce qui pèse surtout dans "Rusty Lake : Roots", outre les énigmes bien pensées, ni trop faciles, ni trop hardues mais toujours intéressantes, c'est l'histoire et l'ambiance. 
C'est vraiment ce type d'ambiance qui permet à un jeu de se faire un nom. Elle le rend mémorable. 

Un jeu qui marque donc. L'histoire glauque et morbide de la famille Vanderboom dont on suivra les membres dans plusieurs épisodes de leur vie, à travers un arbre généalogique qui les relie tous et dont les racines sont...quelques peu maléfiques. 

Oui, il y a des jeux qui font peur, des jeux à jumpscare, avec des graphismes somptueux. Là, ce n'est pas le cas, mais c'est l'un des seuls jeux qui m'aura donné, à plusieurs reprises, une sensation de malaise devant les situations rencontrées. 

Et tout ça pour moins de 3€ (sans soldes steam). Foncez et, petit conseil : ne le laissez prendre la poussière dans votre bibliothèque.

28892706.review:
For now, this episode is certainly the best and the most complete of the series (that you can play in any order).

There are 33 puzzles in it (+ secret ones at the end), and their difficulty is perfectly balanced. The game has a very good longevity and if you are a bit familiar with these kind of puzzles you won't be stucked at any moment.

Like all the games of the series, it's made with Flash, but the realisation is truly beautiful as it uses vector graphics, and has lot of animated details. Don't forget to press CTRL+F when starting the game to play full screen.

I sincerly recommand Rusty Lake Roots, it's a master piece of art, scenaristically, graphically and at the game design.
10/10

28716501.review: The Rusty Lake series has always been unique, with interesting visuals, dark themes, and plenty of jarring and uncomfortable moments. 28336615.review:
C'est avec cet épisode "Roots" que je découvre la série "Rusty Lake", et je dois dire que je suis complètement sous le charme! (Si vous vous posez la question, nul besoin d'avoir fait les épisodes précédents pour profiter pleinement de celui ci).
La direction artistique ne plaira sans doute pas à tout le monde, mais contribue à distiller une  ambiance que j'ai personnellement trouvée aussi étrangement singulière que réussie.
Si les personnages n'ont jamais le temps de se rendre attachants, le jeu en lui-même y parvient parfaitement dans son ensemble.
Un des points forts de ce point'n click en flash, c'est qu'il se découpe en une 30aine de très courtes saynètes : Chaque tableau relate un événement ou un moment déterminant de l'histoire d'une famille, et dessine petit à petit les branches de sa généalogie.
Si certains tableaux sont d'une facilité enfantine, d'autres m'ont bloquée quelques longues minutes avant d'entrevoir la solution...
De (rares) soucis d'ergonomie dans quelques puzzles "moins intuitifs que les autres" pourront parfois agacer un peu ; mais l'excellente qualité de l'ensemble et son prix très modique forcent vraiment l'indulgence (tout particulièrement lorsqu'il se retrouve soldé qui plus est)!
Clairement une très franche recommandation aux amateurs du genre!

28254349.review:
[b]Rusty Lake: Roots[/b] is a point-and-click puzzle game which seems like your average room escape game set in the      19-20th century but takes a morbid turn fast [spoiler]when a dead guy falls out of a grandfather clock[/spoiler].

The puzzles aren't difficult and the game has a rather calm tone despite its morbid and eerie atmosphere. The artstyle is reminiscent of early 20th century pop-up books and gives the game its unique flair. Animations are kept to a minimum but that doesn't affect the overall quality of the game. The game's weird and often disturbing story fits the creepy nature of [i]Rusty Lake[/i] and is "narrated" through the puzzles the player completes.

Entertaining puzzles, eerie atmosphere and low price, this game is well worth your time and I am looking forward to more games like it. 9/10

28124104.review:
Another amazing game by an amazing developer. I have played all cube escape games and both Rusty Lake games. Every game shows improvements, from small details to new puzzle ideas, new mechanics and oooh boy, the secrets. The story of both series are amazing. They are connected, and while the first two or three cube escape games seem made up as they went along, the sequels felt like the story was thought out, sometimes there are secrets that, to unlock, you would need to play the NEXT game on the series, which shows that the story is not made up as they go along, like with some other games out there (not going to point fingers, but I think you know the one I'm talking about. And if you don't... IDK).
Rusty Lake: Roots DOES NOT disappoint, and was totally worth the wait and the money. You now don't arrows to click and see another wall in the room, you now have a wide room, which scrolls, and is a lot less confusing and makes the player focus a lot more on the puzzles instead of finding items and clicking everywhere. But the game is still hard, with well made puzzles, (just like any game in the series. These aren't easy, okay?) that will surely make you think. The game now has levels, which wasn't seen before on previous Rusty Lake games, and the game let's you play the levels in the order you want, for example, if you are stuck in one Frank's levels, you can always go to Rose, and that makes the game less stressful, because you can take a break from that certain part you are in while still playing and enjoying Rust Lake: Roots.
The game is a lot longer than previous games from the franchise, making every penny worth it. Not only that, but when you finish the game you can beat a few levels differently, and find some secrets which lead to a secret level, where... Nah, I'm not going to spoil it. Just note that to get there it's going to take a good memory and good walkthroughs... just in case.
Anyways...
This review is already long as it is, so I'm going to finish it off by talking about the developers. They can make a fun game, with nice,well told story, nice game mechanics and, of course, awesome puzzles. But they thought that wasn't enough, and decided to be nice to fans and actually listen to them when it comes to feedback, fanart, reviews, suggestions, etc... They have a twitter, by the way, and it was really good to see a developer interacting with their fans in such a nice and genuine way! They retweet fanarts, tweets talking about the game, reviews, etc... (I would just like to point out that they also liked every single tweet I sent to them, including something I tweeted on a, I don't know, maybe one or two months old retweet of theirs).
Rusty Lake makes great point and click games, and if you like this kind of game, definitly check out cube escape and both   (premium) rusty lake games, you won't regret it.
Sorry about the lenght of the review, and also for any spelling mistakes or bad grammar, english is not my first language.
P.S: To enjoy the game EVEN MORE play it while you eat chocolate. Never fails.

28116044.review:
rusty lake的新作，作为第二部收费作品其内容的丰富度对得起它两倍于于第一部的价格（史低价比较）。
首先说说rusty lake系列共通的优点：
1.严谨的解谜流程设计。
2.难度合适的谜题，基本不需要依靠攻略。
3.主次分明，寻物部分和小游戏的设计起到很好的点缀作用。
4.没有任何出戏的提示。

着重说说本作的特色。
1.流程相对较长，通关大概需要6小时，总计33小关（加一隐藏关），每关大概由一两个谜题组成；之前的作品也有分阶段的，不过从来没有分的这么细，排除了很多干扰，使谜题更明确；谜题大多保持着以往的高质量，不过有些题目过于简单，有凑数的嫌疑。
2.相较于以往很抽象的叙述风格，本作有比较清晰的剧情脉络；故事内容更加丰富，抽丝剥茧般展现了一段跌宕起伏的家族史，就像在看一部大型伦理剧....之前的作品基本上是玩完以后一脸懵逼，通关本作却让人有种豁然开朗的感觉——然而还是留了很多坑...
3.其他的一些细节，简化了UI，加入了一些操作提示（没啥必要），加入了各种语言（虽然个人以为英文文本都挺简单的）；取消了之前点击两次才能获取物品的设计，这让我很高兴。
4.小问题：每小关通关以后几乎不能回顾，对话也只出现一次，让剧情强迫症很难受，没看清的内容就看不到了；最后弄了个造物游戏也是挺莫名其妙的，强行延长游戏寿命？有点画蛇添足。

总结一下：纵向对比，本作在流程安排和剧情上做了很多新尝试，可以说是有所突破，单就这几倍于之前任一作的内容就值回票价了；横向对比，rusty lake系列，个人认为在steam上的解谜游戏中是出类拔萃的，本作也不例外。史低11的价格（原价也贵不了几块），如果是解谜游戏（有别于hidden object类寻物游戏）爱好者，你值得拥有。

28037178.review:
SPOILER ALERT

Though slightly dissapointing, Rusty Lake Roots gets the disturbing and creepy level I have yet to find in a game.
I think it lacked the awesome disturbing feel of murdering and cooking sentient animals and then feeding them to their animal friends.
It tried to match the atmosphere of Rusty Lake Hotel but failed by not giving the characters any emotion at all, always dead pan(and though that might have been creepy I think you'll get what I'm talking about if you play it)

I was also dissapointed with the fact that Roots strayed from the traditional obssession with the cubes, the memories. It was,  well upsetting to see they had changed from what was apperently travelling through and changing memories(an great concept) to what seemed to be boring, tired old time travel.
And the cubes, so far Rusty Lake has done a great job in building up a feeling of foreboding and horror whenever you see one of the cubes, I mean extracting memories to make these cubes and why?

Also it didn't continue with the story of Dale Vandermeer(which for those of you who don't know means Dale of the lake(Illuminati confirmed)) though the Vanderboom's(of the tree) might be somehow related...

BUT Rusty Lake is a great game and I reccomend it

Wunderschönes Spiel, mit einem wiedererkennbaren Artwork.
Die Story verbindet sich mit den Restlichen Teilen der Spiele.
Jedes Rätsel ist eine Besonderheit für sich und obwohl eines
schwieriger ist als das andere sind alle ohne Nachschauen der Lösungen lösbar.
